46.Samy Mahdy: “Joseph, O the truthful man, seek for us the ruling in seven fat cows being eaten by seven lean ones, and seven green spikes, and others dried up, perhaps that I may return to the people, perhaps that they may be knowing.”

47.Samy Mahdy: He said, “You will be planting for seven consecutive lunar years. So, whatever you harvest, leave it in its spikes, except a little from what you are eating.”

48.Samy Mahdy: Then after that seven, severe ones will come and will eat what you have forwarded for them, except a little from what you are fortifying.

49.Samy Mahdy: Then after that comes a year in it the people will rescue, and in it they are juicing.

50.Samy Mahdy: The king said, “Bring him to me.” So, when the messenger came to him, he said, “Go back to your lord, so ask him what the condition of the women is, who cut their hands; surely my Lord with their plot is Knowledgeable.”

51.Samy Mahdy: He said, “What was your condition, when you seduced Joseph about himself?” They said, “Prevention for Allah! We did not know bad about him.” The Cherished Man’s woman said, “Now the right came out. It was I who seduced him, and he is among the truthful ones.”

52.Samy Mahdy: “That is to let him know that I did not betray him with the unseen, and surely Allah does not guide the betrayers' plot.

53.Samy Mahdy: “And I am not exonerating myself. Surely the soul commands with the badness, except whatever my Lord has mercified. Surely my Lord is Forgiver, Merciful.”

54.Samy Mahdy: And the king said, “Bring him to me, and I will exclusivize him for myself.” So, when he spoke to him, he said, “Today you are with us an enabled, an honorable.”

55.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Set me up on the earth’s treasures; I am a keeper and Knowledgeable.”

56.Samy Mahdy: And thus We enabled Joseph in the earth, to settle from it wherever he willed. We inflict with Our mercy whoever We will, and We never waste the benefactors’ wage.

57.Samy Mahdy: And the Hereafter wage is a goodness for those who believed and were showing piety.

58.Samy Mahdy: And Joseph's brothers came, so they entered upon him. So, he recognized them, while they were denying him.

59.Samy Mahdy: And when he equipped them with their equipment, he said, “Bring me with a brother of yours from your father. Haven't you seen that I fulfill the volume measure, and I am the best hostler?”

60.Samy Mahdy: “So, if you do not bring with him to me, so there is no volume measure for you with me, nor you near me.”

61.Samy Mahdy: They said, “We will seduce his father about him. And surely, we will do it.”

62.Samy Mahdy: And he said for his guys, “Set up their goods in their saddlebags; perhaps they may recognize them if they return to their families, perhaps they may be returning.”

63.Samy Mahdy: So when they returned to their father, they said, “O our father, was prevented from us, the volume measure, so send our brother with us, we will be getting measure. And surely, we are keepers for him.”

64.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Shall I entrust you upon him, as I entrusted you with his brother before? So, Allah is the Best Keeper, and He is the most merciful of the merciful ones.”

65.Samy Mahdy: And when they opened their baggage, they found that their goods were returned to them. They said, “O our father, we are not transgressing? Here are our goods, returned to us. And we will profit our family, and keep our brother, and increase an additional camel-measure. That is an easy measure.”

66.Samy Mahdy: He said, “I will not send him with you, unless you bring me a charter from Allah that you will bring him back to me, unless you should be surrounded with you.” So, when they gave him their charter, he said, “Allah, about what we say is trustee.”

67.Samy Mahdy: And he said, “O my sons, do not enter from one door, and enter from different doors. And I do not avail you from Allah in anything. Surely the judgment is except for Allah. On Him I rely, and on Him, so they will rely on the reliable ones.”

68.Samy Mahdy: And when they entered from where their father had commanded them, it was not availed about them from Allah of a thing; except just a need in Jacob’s soul, which he accomplished. And surely, he was a knowledge’s possessor for what We taught him, but most of the people are not knowing.

69.Samy Mahdy: And when they entered upon Joseph, he sheltered his brother to him, he said, “I am your brother; so, do not be sorrowful with what they were working.”

70.Samy Mahdy: So, when he equipped them with their equipment, he set up the drinking-cup in his brother’s saddlebag. Then an announcer called out, “O animal-riders! you are thieves.”

71.Samy Mahdy: They said, and they approached them, “What are you missing?”

72.Samy Mahdy: They said, “We are missing the king’s cup. And whoever brings with it, will have a camel-measure; and I am with it a claimer.”

73.Samy Mahdy: They said, “By Allah, you already know we did not come to spoil the earth, and we are not thieves.”

74.Samy Mahdy: They said, “What shall be his penalty, if you are liars.?”

75.Samy Mahdy: They said, “His penalty, whoever was found in his saddlebag: so, it will be his penalty. And thus, we penalize the oppressors.”

76.Samy Mahdy: So he started with their bags, before his brother's bag. Then he extracted it out of his brother’s bag. And thus, We plan for Joseph; he could not take his brother in the king’s religion, unless that Allah willed. We elevate whoever We will have degrees; and above every knowledge possessor, a Knowledgeable.

77.Samy Mahdy: They said, “If he steals, then already a brother for him has stolen before.” So, Joseph secreted it within himself, and did not appear it to them. He said, “You are in an evil position, and Allah is a knower with what you are describing.”

78.Samy Mahdy: They said, “O The Cherished Man, he has a father, a very old man, so take one of us in his place. Surely, We see you among the benefactors.”

79.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Incantation to Allah to take except the one whose we found our property with him; surely then we are oppressors.”

80.Samy Mahdy: So, when they despaired from him, they secluded themselves in private consultation. Their eldest said, “Don’t you know that your father already took upon you a charter from Allah, and before you over neglected, in Joseph? So, I will not depart this land until my father permits me or judges Allah for me and He is the Best of Judges.”

81.Samy Mahdy: “Return back to your father, so you say, ‘O our father, surely your son has stolen. And we did not witness except with what we know, and we were not keepers for the unseen.’”

82.Samy Mahdy: “And ask the village which we were in, and the animal-riders in which we came within them. And surely, we are truthful.”

83.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Nay, but your souls have facilitated a command for you. So, beautiful patience. Perhaps Allah will bring me with them altogether. He is Al-Aalim (The Knower), Al-Hakeem (The Wise).”

84.Samy Mahdy: And he turned away from them, and said, “O my sorrow upon Joseph.” And his eyes whitened from the grieve, so he was a suppressor.

85.Samy Mahdy: They said, “By Allah, you will be still remembering Joseph, until you are fatally ill, or be among the destroyed ones.”

86.Samy Mahdy: He said, “I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah what you are not knowing.”

87.Samy Mahdy: “O my sons, go then sense of Joseph and his brother, and do not despair from Allah's spirit. Surely none despairs from Allah's spirit except the infidel’s kinfolk.”

88.Samy Mahdy: So, when they entered upon him, they said, “O The Cherished Man, the harm has touched us, and our family. And we have brought scant merchandise. So, fulfill for us the measure, and give alms upon us, surely Allah recompense the charitable ones.”

89.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Were you knowing what you did with Joseph and his brother, when you were ignorant ones?”

90.Samy Mahdy: They said, “Are you, yourself, Joseph?” He said, “I am Joseph, and this is my brother. Allah has conferred favors upon us. That whoever shows piety and be patient, so Allah never wastes the benefactors' wage.”

91.Samy Mahdy: They said, “By Allah, Allah has already preferred you over us. And we were guilty ones.”

92.Samy Mahdy: He said, “There is no reproach upon you Today. Allah forgives you. And He is the best merciful of the merciful ones.”

93.Samy Mahdy: “Go with my shirt this, so throw it over my father’s face, he will come seeing. And bring to me your family altogether.”

94.Samy Mahdy: And when the animal-riders dispatched, their father said, “I find Joseph’s smell, unless you would be disproving.”

95.Samy Mahdy: They said, “By Allah, you are still in your old astray.”

96.Samy Mahdy: So, when the preacher came, he threw it over his face, so he returned, seeing. He said, “Am I not saying to you that I know from Allah what you are not knowing?”

97.Samy Mahdy: They said, “O our father, seek forgiveness for our misdeeds; we were guilty ones.”

98.Samy Mahdy: He said, “I will ask my Lord to forgive you. He is Al- Ghafor (The Forgiver), Al-Raheem (The merciful to his creation and himself).”

99.Samy Mahdy: So, when they entered upon Joseph, he sheltered his parents to him, and said, “Enter Egypt, if Allah will, safe.”

100.Samy Mahdy: And he elevated his parents on the throne, and they fell down in prostration for him. He said, “O my father, this is the interpretation of my vision before. My Lord has already set it up true. He excelled to me, when He exited me out of prison, and brought by you from the Bedouins, after Satan had obsessed between me and my brothers. Surely My Lord is Kind for what He wills. He is Al-Aalim (The Knower), Al- Hakeem (The Wise).”

101.Samy Mahdy: “My Lord, You already gave me, among the sovereignty, and taught me the narrations’ interpretations. Originator of the skies and the earth; You are my Guardian in the Dunya and the Hereafter, deceased me submitting (Muslim) and joined me with the righteous.”

102.Samy Mahdy: That is from the unseen news, We reveal to you. You were not present with them when they put together their matter and they were guiling.

103.Samy Mahdy: And not most of the people, even though you are eager, will be believers.

104.Samy Mahdy: And you are not asking them for it, among wages. Surely it is not except a reminder to the worlds.

105.Samy Mahdy: And how many among a verse in the skies and the earth, they are passing upon it, while they are averting about?

106.Samy Mahdy: And most of them do not believe in Allah except while they are associating.

107.Samy Mahdy: So have they secured that come to them over-covering from Allah’s torment, or the Hour will come to them unexpectedly, while they do not feel?

108.Samy Mahdy: Say, “This is my pathway; I am calling to Allah, upon insight, I and whoever followed me. And glorified is Allah; and I am not among the polytheists.”

109.Samy Mahdy: And We did not send before you except men, We revealed to them, among the villages’ inhabitants. So, have they not walked on the earth, so observe how it was a consequence to those before them? And the Hereafter Home is a goodness for those who show piety. So, will you not be reasoning?

110.Samy Mahdy: Until, when the messengers have despaired, and thought that they were falsified already, our victory came to them. So, We save whoever We will, and Our adversity is not averted from the criminal kinfolk.

111.Samy Mahdy: In their stories is already an admonition lesson for the mind’s possessors. It was not a slandered narration, but a confirmation of which is between its hands, and a detailing of everything, and a guidance, and a mercy for believing kinfolk.

1.Samy Mahdy: Alif, Lam, Meem, Ra. These are the Book’s verses. And That which is revealed to you from your Lord is the right, but most of the people are not believing.

2.Samy Mahdy: Allah is the one who elevated the skies without pillars; you could see it, then He settled on the Throne. And He subserviated the sun and the moon, each is running for a named term. He manages the matter, and details the verses, perhaps you may be certain with your Lord’s meeting.

3.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who spread the earth and set up mountains within it and rivers. And among all the fruits He set up within it two mates. The night overcovers the day. Surely in that are verses for a kinfolk who think.

4.Samy Mahdy: And in the earth are adjacent parts, and paradises from vines, and vegetation, and date-palms are having the same root or having distinct roots, watered with one water. And We prefer some of it over some others in the eating. In that are verses for kinfolk who reason.

5.Samy Mahdy: And if you wonder, so a wonder is their saying: “Is it when we become dust, will we be in a new creation?” Those are who disbelieved with their Lord. Those are the shackles in their necks. And those are The Fire 's Companions, immortals therein.

6.Samy Mahdy: And they are hastening you with the bad deed before the good deed, and already passed before them the examples. And Your Lord is a possessor of forgiveness for the people over their oppression, and surely your Lord is severe in the punishment.

7.Samy Mahdy: And those who disbelieved say, “If only was a verse sent down upon him from his Lord?” You are only a warner, and for every kinfolk is a guider.

8.Samy Mahdy: Allah knows what every female bear, and what the wombs recede and what increases. And everything is with Him by a measure.

9.Samy Mahdy: The Unseen Knower and the witnessing; Al-Kabeer (The Grand), Al-Muta'al (The Supreme Exalted).

10.Samy Mahdy: It was the same; whoever among you secreted the speech or who be aloud with it; and whoever is hiding by the night and is conspicuous by the daytime.

11.Samy Mahdy: For him trackers (Angels); between his hands and from behind him, keeping him from Allah’s command. Surely Allah does not change what is within a kinfolk until they are changing what is within themselves. And if Allah wanted with kinfolk a badness, so there is no repelling for it.; and they have no guardian without Him.

12.Samy Mahdy: He is the one who shows you the lightning, as fear and covetousness. And He institutes the heavy clouds.

13.Samy Mahdy: The thunder glorifies His praises, and the angels from His fear. And He sends the thunderbolts, so He inflicts with them whoever He wills. And they are arguing in Allah, while He is severe, the impossibility.

14.Samy Mahdy: For Him the right call. And those who are called without Him, will not respond for them with a thing, except as someone who stretched his hands towards the water to reach his mouth, and it will not reach it. And the infidels’ call is not except, in an astray.

15.Samy Mahdy: And for Allah prostrates whoever is in the skies and the earth, willingly and unwillingly, and their shadows, in the morning and in the evening. ۩

16.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Who is the Lord of the skies and the earth?” Say, “Allah.” Say, “So have you taken without Him guardians, they do not own for themselves a benefit or a harm.” Say, “Are the blind and the seer equal? Or are the darkness and the light being equal? Or they set up for Allah associates, they created the likes of His creation, so that the creations seemed upon them alike? Say, “Allah is the creator of everything, and He is Al –Wahid (The One), Al-Qahar (The Irresistible).”

17.Samy Mahdy: He sends down water from the sky, so the valleys flow with their quantities. So, the torrent carries a rising foam. And from what they fuel upon it in the fire for seeking ornaments or utensils, of a foam similar to it. Thus, Allah cites the right and the invalid. So as for the foam, it is gone as a slag, but what benefits the people will be bide in the earth. Thus, Allah cites the examples.

18.Samy Mahdy: For those who respond for their Lord is excellence. And for those who do not respond for Him, even if they had everything on earth altogether, and the like of it with it, to ransomed themselves with it, those will have the worst reckoning; and their shelter is Gohanam (Hell), and wretched is the bedding.

19.Samy Mahdy: So is he who knows that what was sent down to you from your Lord is the right, is like who blind? surely only the minds’ possessors who remember.

20.Samy Mahdy: Those who fulfill Allah's covenant, and do not break the charter.

21.Samy Mahdy: And those who are joining what Allah has commanded with it to be joined, and aweing of their Lord, and fearing the bad reckoning.

22.Samy Mahdy: And those who be patient sought their Lord's face, and established the prayers, and spent from what We had livelihood them, secretly and publicly, and ward off with the good deed, the bad deed. Those for them are the consequence of (heavenly) Home.

23.Samy Mahdy: Eden Paradises, they will enter them, and whoever is righteous among their parents, and their couples, and their offspring. And the angels are entering upon them from every door.

24.Samy Mahdy: “Peace be upon you, with what you were patient with. So, graciousness is the consequence of (heavenly) Home.”

25.Samy Mahdy: And those who break Allah’s covenant, after it was chartered, and cut off what Allah has commanded with it to be joined, and spoiling in earth, those, for them is the curse, and for them is The Bad Home.

26.Samy Mahdy: Allah extends the livelihood for whoever He wills and quantizes. And they rejoice with the Dunya (worldly) life; and the Dunya life in the Hereafter, is not except an enjoyment.

27.Samy Mahdy: And those who disbelieved say, “If only a verse was sent down upon him from his Lord.” Say, “Surely Allah strays whoever He wills, and He guides to Himself whoever be penitent.”

28.Samy Mahdy: Those who believed, and their cores tranquil with Allah’s mention. Verily with Allah’s mention the cores are tranquil.”

29.Samy Mahdy: Those who believed and worked the righteous deeds, blessing fortune for them and a finest return place.

30.Samy Mahdy: Thus, we sent you among a community already before it, communities have passed away, to recite upon them that we revealed to you. And they are disbelieving with Al-Rahman (The Most Merciful). Say, “He is my Lord; there is no God except Him; upon Him I rely, and to Him my repentance.”

31.Samy Mahdy: And if a Quran, with which mountains were moved, or the earth was cut with it, or the dead was spoken with it. Nay, but for Allah the command altogether. So, did those who believed not despair that if Allah willed, He would have guided the people altogether? And those who disbelieved still inflict them by what they made, a bashing disaster, or it places near their homes, until Allah’s promise comes. Surely Allah never breaks the promise.

32.Samy Mahdy: And it was already ridiculed with messengers before you, so I gave time to those who disbelieved, and then I took them. So, how was it a (My) punishment?!

33.Samy Mahdy: So who is he standing upon every soul with what it was earned? And they set up associates for Allah. Say, “Named them! Or are you informing Him with what in the earth He does not know, or with what is a presumption of the speech?” Nay, but it was prettified for those who disbelieved their guile, and they hindered the pathway. And whoever Allah strays him, so he has no guide.

34.Samy Mahdy: For them is a torment in the Dunya (worldly) life, and the Hereafter torment will be harder. And for them none among a protector from Allah.

35.Samy Mahdy: The paradise example which the pious promised: the rivers are running beneath it; its food is permanent, and its shade. That is the consequence of those who are showing piety, and the consequences of the infidels is the Fire.

36.Samy Mahdy: And those whom We gave them the Book are rejoicing with what was sent down to you, and among the parties who are denying some of it. Say, “I am commanded only to worship Allah, and to never associate with Him. To Him I call, and to Him is my return place.”

37.Samy Mahdy: And thus We sent it down as an Arabic judgment. And if you followed their desires, after what was coming to you from the knowledge, you would have neither guardian nor protector from Allah.

38.Samy Mahdy: And We already sent messengers before you, and We set up for them spouses and offspring. And it is not for a messenger to bring with a verse except with Allah’s permission. For, every term (Time) is a book.

39.Samy Mahdy: Allah erases whatever He wills, and He affirms. And with Him is The Mother Book.

40.Samy Mahdy: And if We show you some of what We promise them, or We decease you, so upon you only the notification, and upon Us is the reckoning.

41.Samy Mahdy: Have they not seen that We come to the earth, decreasing it from among its extremities? And Allah judges; and no pursuer for His judgment. And He is swift in reckoning.

42.Samy Mahdy: And already those before them guiled, so for Allah the guile altogether. He knows what every soul earns. And The infidels will know for whom the consequence of the (heavenly) Home.

43.Samy Mahdy: And those who disbelieved say, “You are not a messenger.” Say, “It is sufficient with Allah a witness between me and between you, and whoever with him The Knowledge of The Book.”

1.Samy Mahdy: Alif, Lam, Ra. A book We send it down to you, to exit out the people from the darkness to the light, by their Lord’s permission, to a path of Al-Aaziz (The Almighty), Al-Hameed (The Praiseworthy).

2.Samy Mahdy: Allah is the one for Him whatever is in the skies and whatever is in the earth. And woe for the infidels from a severe torment.

3.Samy Mahdy: Those who love the Dunya (Present) life more than the Hereafter, and hinder Allah's pathway, and seek its crookedness, those are in a farthest astray.

4.Samy Mahdy: And We did not send a messenger except with his kinfolk tongue language, to demonstrate for them. So, Allah strays whoever He wills, and guides whoever He wills. He is Al-Aziz (The Almighty), Al-Hakeem (The Wise).

5.Samy Mahdy: And We already sent Moses with Our verses that: “Exit your kinfolk out from the darkness to the light and remind them with Allah’s days.” Surely, within that is verses for every patient and thankful one.”

6.Samy Mahdy: And when Moses said to his kinfolk, “Remember Allah’s graces upon you, when He saved you from Pharaoh’s folk, were afflicting you with the bad torment, slaughtering your sons and letting your women live. And, in that was a great scourge from your Lord.”

7.Samy Mahdy: And when your Lord announced: “If you thanked, I would increase you; and if you disbelieved, surely My torment is severe.”

8.Samy Mahdy: And Moses said, “If you disbelieved, you and whoever in the earth altogether, so surely Allah is Rich, Praiseworthy.”

9.Samy Mahdy: Has not come to you, news of those before you, Noah’s kinfolk, and Aad, and Thamud, and those after them? None knows them except Allah. Their messengers came to them with the proofs, so they returned their hands in their mouths, and said, “We disbelieved with what you were sent with, and we are in suspicion from what you are calling us to it, doubtedly.”

10.Samy Mahdy: Their messengers said, “Is there in Allah a doubt, Originator of the skies and the earth? He calls you to forgive you among your misdeeds, and to postpone you until a named term.” They said, “You are only humankind like us; you want to avert us about what our parents were worshiped; so, bring us with an obvious sultan.”

11.Samy Mahdy: Their messengers said to them, “Surely, we are only humankinds like you, but Allah confers favor upon whomever He wills among His slaves. And it was not for us to bring you with a sultan, except with Allah’s permission. And upon Allah, so the believers will rely.”

12.Samy Mahdy: “And why are we not relying on Allah, and He already has guided us to our pathways? And we will be patient on whatever you harm us. And upon Allah the relyers should be relying.”

13.Samy Mahdy: And those who disbelieved said to their messengers, “We will exit you out from our land, or you return in our creed.” So, their Lord revealed to them: “We will destroy the oppressors.”

14.Samy Mahdy: “And we will reside you, on the earth after them. That was for whoever fears My Stature and fears my threat.”

15.Samy Mahdy: And they acquired conquest and failed every stubborn mighty.

16.Samy Mahdy: From beyond him is Gohanam (Hell), and he waters from a purulent water.

17.Samy Mahdy: He gulps it, and not almost tolerates its swallow. And death comes at him from every place, and he will not die. And from beyond him, a harsh torment.

18.Samy Mahdy: An example of those who disbelieved in their Lord, their works are like ashes, which the wind blows furiously with it on a stormy day. They are not capable of what they have earned on a thing. That is the farthest astray.

19.Samy Mahdy: Have you not seen that Allah created the skies and the earth with the right? If He wills, He goes away with you, and brings a new creation.

20.Samy Mahdy: And that is not mighty upon Allah.

21.Samy Mahdy: And they emerged altogether for Allah. So, the weakened said to those who were arrogant, “We were your followers, so are you availing us from Allah’s torment of a thing?” They said, “Had Allah guided us, we would have guided you. It is the same upon us; whether we are impatient, or patient; there is no escape for us.”

22.Samy Mahdy: And Satan said, when the matter is decreed, “Surely Allah has promised you the right promise, and I promised you, so I failed you. And I had no Sultan upon you, except that I called you, so you responded to me. So do not blame me and blame yourselves. I cannot scream to your aid, nor can you scream to my aid? I disbelieved with what you are associating with me before. Surely the oppressors for them are a painful torment.”

23.Samy Mahdy: And those who believed and worked the righteous deeds entered paradises beneath which the rivers are running, immortals therein, by their Lord’s permission. Their greeting therein: “Peace.”

24.Samy Mahdy: Have you not seen how Allah cites an example? A good word is like a good tree, its root is firm, and its branches are in the sky.

25.Samy Mahdy: It gives its food every term by its Lord’s permission. And Allah cites the examples for the people, perhaps they may be remembering.

26.Samy Mahdy: And an example of a bad word is like a malignant tree, it is being uprooted from above the earth; it has not any stability.

27.Samy Mahdy: Allah stabilizes those who believed, with the constant saying, in the Dunya life, and in the Hereafter. And Allah strays the oppressors. And Allah does whatever He wills.

28.Samy Mahdy: Have you not seen those who altered Allah’s graces to infidelity, and placed their kinfolk into The Perdition Home?

29.Samy Mahdy: Gohanam (Hell), they flamed in it. And wretched is a settle.

30.Samy Mahdy: And they set up rivals to Allah, to stray from His pathway. Say, “Enjoy; so surely your destination to the Fire.”

31.Samy Mahdy: Say for My slaves who believed “establish the prayers, and spend from what we had livelihood them, secretly and publicly, before a Day will come in which there is neither selling nor intimate friendship.

32.Samy Mahdy: Allah is the one Who created the skies and the earth, and sends down from the sky water, so with it He brought out from the fruitage a livelihood for you. And He subserviated the arks for you, to run in the sea with His command, and He subserviated the rivers for you.

33.Samy Mahdy: And He subserviated the sun and the moon for you, both continuously, and He subserviated the night and the day for you.

34.Samy Mahdy: And He has given you from all what you have asked Him. And if you count Allah’s blessings; you would not enumerate them. Surely the human is an oppressor, infidel.

35.Samy Mahdy: And when Abraham said, “O my Lord, set up this town secure, and avoid me and my sons to worship the idols.”

36.Samy Mahdy: “My Lord, they have strayed a lot from the people. So, whoever followed me, so he is from me; and whoever disobeyed me, so you are Forgiver, Merciful.

37.Samy Mahdy: “Our Lord, I have resided from my offspring with a valley not a possessor of vegetation, at Your Sacred House, our Lord, let them establish the prayers. So, set up hearts among the people fond towards them, and provide them livelihood from the fruitage, perhaps they may be thankful.”

38.Samy Mahdy: “Our Lord, Surely You know what we conceal and what we announce. And none among things is hiding upon Allah, in the earth or in the sky.”

39.Samy Mahdy: “The Praise for Allah, the one who has endowed for me, at the old age, Ishmael and Isaac. My Lord is The Calling’s Hearer.”

40.Samy Mahdy: “My Lord, set up me, the prayers establisher and among my offspring. Our Lord, accept my calling.”

41.Samy Mahdy: “Our Lord, forgive me, and my parents, and the believers, on the Day when the Reckoning will be established.”

42.Samy Mahdy: And do not consider that Allah is inattentive about what the oppressors are doing. He only postpones them till a Day the sights will stare in it.

43.Samy Mahdy: Racing ahead, their heads raised up, their glance does not return to them (Not blink), and in their hearts are air (filled).

44.Samy Mahdy: And warn the people of a day when the torment will come to them, so those who are oppressed will say, “Our Lord, postpone us to a near term, we will respond to Your call and follow the messengers.” Had you not sworn, before that you have no extinction?

45.Samy Mahdy: And you resided in the residents of those who oppressed themselves, and it demonstrated to you how We did with them, and We cited for you the examples.

46.Samy Mahdy: And they already guiled their guiles, and with Allah their guiles, and even if their guiles, the mountains will disappear from it.

47.Samy Mahdy: So, do not consider that Allah will break His promise for His messengers. Surely Allah is Mighty, possessor of Revenge.

48.Samy Mahdy: On a day when the earth will be replaced, other than the earth and the skies, and they emerged for Allah, Al-Wahid (The One), Al-Qahar (The Irresistible).

49.Samy Mahdy: And you will see on that Day, the criminals bound together in the fetters.

50.Samy Mahdy: Their garments are from tar, and the Fire is over-covering their faces.

51.Samy Mahdy: That Allah will recompense each soul what it was earned. Surely Allah is swift in reckoning.

52.Samy Mahdy: This is a notification for the people, and to be warned with it, and to know that He is only One God, and to let the minds’ possessors remember.

1.Samy Mahdy: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the Book’s verses, and an obvious Quran.

2.Samy Mahdy: Perhaps, those who disbelieved wish that they were Muslims.

3.Samy Mahdy: Forsake them, to eat, and enjoy, and the hope beguile them. So, they will be knowing.

4.Samy Mahdy: And none among a village We destroy it except and for it a known book.

5.Samy Mahdy: Not of a community will precede its term, nor will they postpone.

6.Samy Mahdy: And they said, “O the one who sent down upon him the reminder, you are a madman.”

7.Samy Mahdy: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you are among the truthful ones?”

8.Samy Mahdy: We are not sending down the angels except with the right, and they (The infidels) were not respiting.

9.Samy Mahdy: Surely, We sent down the Reminder, and We will be a keeper for it.

10.Samy Mahdy: And We already sent before you in the sects of the former.

11.Samy Mahdy: And none among a messenger came to them, except they ridicule him.

12.Samy Mahdy: Thus we insert it in the criminals’ cores.

13.Samy Mahdy: They are not believing in it, and already the former’s route (Sunnah) has passed away.

14.Samy Mahdy: And if We opened upon them a door from the sky, so they are still within it serpentine ( to ascend to sky).

15.Samy Mahdy: They would say, “Our sights are only blocked; nay, but we are bewitched kinfolk.”

16.Samy Mahdy: And We already set up in the sky constellations and prettified it to the onlookers.

17.Samy Mahdy: And we kept it from every outcast devil.

18.Samy Mahdy: Except whoever would steal the hearing, so an obvious shooting star pursued him.

19.Samy Mahdy: And the earth We spread it, and threw Stabilizers (Mountains) within it, and within it we planted among every balanced thing.

20.Samy Mahdy: And we set up for you, therein means of living, and for those whom you have not livelihood them (Other Creatures).

21.Samy Mahdy: And there is none from things except with us its treasuries, and We do not send it down except with a known measure.

22.Samy Mahdy: And We send the winds pollinators; so, We send down water from the sky, so, We water it for you, and you are not storing it for.

23.Samy Mahdy: And surely, We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritors.

24.Samy Mahdy: And already We know the earlier among you, and already We know the later ones.

25.Samy Mahdy: And surely your Lord, He who musters them. Surely, He is Wise, Knowledgeable.

26.Samy Mahdy: And We already created the human from Silsal, from molded sludge.

27.Samy Mahdy: And the jinn We created before, from the poisonous burning smokeless fire.

28.Samy Mahdy: And when Your Lord said to the angels, “I am creating a humankind from Silsal, from molded sludge.”

29.Samy Mahdy: “So, when I have normalized him, and blew into him from My spirit, so fall down prostrating for him.”

30.Samy Mahdy: So the angels prostrated, all of them altogether.

31.Samy Mahdy: Except Iblis. He refused to be with the prostraters.

32.Samy Mahdy: He said, “O Iblis, what is with you to not be with the prostraters?”

33.Samy Mahdy: He said, “I will not be prostrating for a humankind, You created him from Silsal, from molded sludge.”

34.Samy Mahdy: He said, “So, exit out from it, so you are outcasted”

35.Samy Mahdy: “And surely is upon you the curse until The Religion Day (Dept).”

36.Samy Mahdy: He said, “My Lord, so respite me to a Day, when they are raising.”

37.Samy Mahdy: He said, “So, you are among the respite ones.”

38.Samy Mahdy: “Till the Known Time Day.”

39.Samy Mahdy: He said, “My Lord, with what You have lured me, I will prettify for them on the earth, and I will lure them altogether.”

40.Samy Mahdy: “Except Your slaves among them, the sincere ones.”

41.Samy Mahdy: He said, “This is a path on Me straight.”

42.Samy Mahdy: “Surely My slaves you have not upon them a Sultan, except whoever followed you among the lured ones.”

43.Samy Mahdy: And surely Gohanam (Hell) is their appointment altogether.

44.Samy Mahdy: “It has seven doors; for each door among them is a divided portion.”

45.Samy Mahdy: Surely the pious are in Paradises and Springs.

46.Samy Mahdy: “Enter it with peace, secured.”

47.Samy Mahdy: And We stripped off what was in their chests among a grudge, brethren, on beds facing each other.

48.Samy Mahdy: No painful fatigue will touch them therein, nor will they be exited out of it.

49.Samy Mahdy: Inform My slaves that I am Al-Ghafor (The Forgiver), Al-Raheem (The merciful to his creation and himself).

50.Samy Mahdy: And that My torment is the painful torment.

51.Samy Mahdy: And inform them about Abraham’s guests.

52.Samy Mahdy: When they entered upon him, they said, “Peace.” He said, “We are frightened of you.”

53.Samy Mahdy: They said, “Do not be frightened; we preach (Good tidings) you with Knowledgeable lad.”

54.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Do you preach (Good tidings) to me that old age has touched me? So, with what do you preach (Good tidings)?”

55.Samy Mahdy: They said, “We preach (Good tidings) you with the right, so do not be from the despairing ones.”

56.Samy Mahdy: He said, “And who despair from his Lord’s mercy except the astray ones?”

57.Samy Mahdy: He said, “So what is the condition of you, O the messengers?”

58.Samy Mahdy: They said, “We were sent to a criminal kinfolk.”

59.Samy Mahdy: “Except for Lot’s folk; we will save them altogether.”

60.Samy Mahdy: “Except for his woman.” We have decreed that she was among the remaining ones.

61.Samy Mahdy: So, when the messengers came to Lot’s folk.

62.Samy Mahdy: He said, “You are an unknown kinfolk.”

63.Samy Mahdy: They said, “Nay, but we brought you with what in it they were skepticized.”

64.Samy Mahdy: “And We brought you, with the right, and surely we are truthful.”

65.Samy Mahdy: “So, walk with your family within a portion of the night, and follow their backs, and let none among you turn back, and go wherever you are being commanded.”

66.Samy Mahdy: And We decreed to him, that is the command: surely remnants of these will be cut off in early morning.

67.Samy Mahdy: And the city’s inhabitants came cheerful.

68.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Surely these are my guests, so do not scandalize me.”

69.Samy Mahdy: “And show Allah’s piety, and do not disgrace me.”

70.Samy Mahdy: They said, “aren't we prohibiting you from the worlds?”

71.Samy Mahdy: He said, “These are my daughters, if you are doing.”

72.Samy Mahdy: By your age, surely, they were, in their drunkenness, confused blindly.

73.Samy Mahdy: So the scream took them at sunrise.

74.Samy Mahdy: So, We set up its Highest as its Lowest, and We rained down upon them stones from flammable clay.

75.Samy Mahdy: Surely in that are verses for the discerners.

76.Samy Mahdy: And it (The City) is by resident pathway.

77.Samy Mahdy: Surely, within that is a verse for the believers.

78.Samy Mahdy: And the Forest’s owners were oppressors.

79.Samy Mahdy: So We get revenge from them. Both are on an obvious highway.

80.Samy Mahdy: And the Hijr’s companions (Place name) falsified the messengers.

81.Samy Mahdy: And We gave them our verses, so they were averting from it.

82.Samy Mahdy: And They were carving from the mountains, homes, secured.

83.Samy Mahdy: So, the scream took them in the morning.

84.Samy Mahdy: So, it was not availing them, what they were earning.

85.Samy Mahdy: And We did not create the skies and the earth, and what is between them, except with the right. And surely the Hour will come, so condone, the beautiful condoning.

86.Samy Mahdy: Surely Your Lord is Al-Khalaq (The Creator), Al-Alim (The Knower).

87.Samy Mahdy: And We have already given you seven from the pairs, and The Great Qur'an.

88.Samy Mahdy: Do not extend your eyes towards what we have enjoyed with it, couples among them, and do not grieve upon them, and lower your wings for the believers.

89.Samy Mahdy: And say, “Surely I am the obvious Warner.”

90.Samy Mahdy: Just as We sent down to the dividers (Jews and Christians).

91.Samy Mahdy: Those who set up the Qur'an into shreds (believe with part and disbelieve with others).

92.Samy Mahdy: By your Lord, We will question them altogether.

93.Samy Mahdy: About what they were working on?

94.Samy Mahdy: So proclaim openly with what you are commanded, and turn away, about the polytheists.

95.Samy Mahdy: We are sufficient for you against the mockers.

96.Samy Mahdy: Those who set up another God with Allah. So, they will be knowing.

97.Samy Mahdy: And We already know that your chest is narrowed with what they were saying.

98.Samy Mahdy: So glorify with your Lord’s praises and be from the prostraters.

99.Samy Mahdy: And worship your Lord until the certainty comes to you.

1.Samy Mahdy: Allah’s command has come, so do not hasten it. Glorified is Him; and exalted about what they are associating.

2.Samy Mahdy: He sends down the angels with the Spirit among His command, upon whoever He wills among His slaves: “Surely warn that there is no God except Me, so show the piety of Me.”

3.Samy Mahdy: He created the skies and the earth with the right. He is exalted about what they are associating.

4.Samy Mahdy: He created the human from a sperm-drop, so behold he is an obvious opponent.

5.Samy Mahdy: And the livestock, He created them for you. Within them are warmth and benefits, and from it you are eating.

6.Samy Mahdy: And for you within them a beauty, when you are resting, and when you are sending them out.

7.Samy Mahdy: And they carry your heavy loads to a town you could not have reached except with the breath's exertion. Surely Your Lord is A Clement, Merciful.

8.Samy Mahdy: And the horses, and the mules, and the donkeys, to ride them, and for adornment. And He creates what you are not knowing.

9.Samy Mahdy: And upon Allah the pathway’s endeavor, and from them are inequitable. And had He willed; He would have guided you all.

10.Samy Mahdy: He is the one Who sends down for you from the sky water. From it for you is a drink, and from it trees within it you are pasturing.

11.Samy Mahdy: He plants for you the vegetation by it, and the olives, and the date-palms, and the grapes, and from all the fruitage. Surely, within that is a verse for a kinfolk who think.

12.Samy Mahdy: And He subserviated for you the night and the day; and the sun, and the moon, and the stars are subservient with His command. Surely, within that is verses for a reasoning kinfolk.

13.Samy Mahdy: And whatsoever He produces for you in the earth different its colors. Surely, within that is a verse for a kinfolk who remember.

14.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who subserviated the sea for you, to eat from it, soft meat, and to exit out ornaments from it, you wear them. And you see the arks cleaving, through it and to seek from His bounty, and perhaps you may be thankful.

15.Samy Mahdy: And he threw stabilizers mountains in it, lest it be shaken by you; and rivers, and pathways, perhaps you may guide.

16.Samy Mahdy: And landmarks, and by the stars they find guidance.

17.Samy Mahdy: So is He who creates, like him who does not create? So, will yourselves not be remembering?

18.Samy Mahdy: And if you count Allah’s graces, you will not enumerate them. Surely Allah is Forgiver, Merciful.

19.Samy Mahdy: And Allah knows what you are secreting and what you are announcing.

20.Samy Mahdy: And those who are being called without Allah are not creating a thing, and they are created.

21.Samy Mahdy: They are dead, not alive; and they are unaware when they will be raised.

22.Samy Mahdy: Your God is one God. So, those who are not believing in the Hereafter, their cores are in denial, and they are arrogant.

23.Samy Mahdy: Assuredly that Allah knows what they are secreting, and what they are announcing. Surely, He doesn't love the arrogant.

24.Samy Mahdy: And if it is said to them, “What has your Lord sent down?” They say, “The formers’ Legends.”

25.Samy Mahdy: To carry their burdens completely on The Resurrection Day, and among the burdens of those whom they are straying (them), without a knowledge. Verily wicked is what they are bearing.

26.Samy Mahdy: Already those before them were guiled, so Allah came to their buildings from the foundations, so the roof collapsed upon them from above them. And the torment came at them from where they do not feel.

27.Samy Mahdy: Then, on The Resurrection Day, He will disgrace them, and say, “Where are my associates those who you were opposing within them?” Those who were given the knowledge said, “Surely the disgrace Today and the badness are upon the infidels.”

28.Samy Mahdy: Those whom the angels decease (them) oppressing themselves, so they cast the surrender: “We were not working the bad.” Yes, surely Allah is Knowledgeable with what you were working on.”

29.Samy Mahdy: So, enter Gohanam’s doors (Hell), immortals therein. So wicked is the arrogant’ dwell.

30.Samy Mahdy: And it was said for those who showed piety, “What has your Lord sent down?” They said, “Goodness.” For those who excelled in this Dunya (world) an excellence, and The Hereafter Home is a goodness. And gracious is the pious’ home.

31.Samy Mahdy: Eden paradises, which they will enter them, beneath which the rivers are running, they have therein whatever they are wishing. Thus, Allah recompenses the pious.

32.Samy Mahdy: Those whom the angels decease them, Good. They (The angels) are saying, “Peace be upon you enter, The Paradise, with what you were working.”

33.Samy Mahdy: Are they waiting except that the angels should come to them, or your Lord’s command should come? Thus, those before them were done. And Allah did not oppress them, but themselves they were oppressing.

34.Samy Mahdy: So it was inflicting them, the badness of what they worked, and banded with them what they were ridiculing with it.

35.Samy Mahdy: And those who associated said, “If Allah willed, we would not have worshiped without Him, of a thing neither of us, nor our parents, nor would we have forbidden without Him, of a thing.” Thus, those before them did. So is there upon the messengers except the obvious notification?

36.Samy Mahdy: And already We missioned a messenger in every community: “That worship Allah and avoid the false god.” So, from them who Allah guided, and from them who the straying was truthed upon him. So, walk on the earth, so observe how it was the falsifiers consequence.

37.Samy Mahdy: If you are eager upon their guidance, then Allah does not guide those whoever He strays. And none for them from supporters.

38.Samy Mahdy: And they swore by Allah with their most effort oaths, “Allah is not arising whoever dies.” Yes, it is a promise upon Him truly, (to arise who dies) but most people are not knowing.

39.Samy Mahdy: To demonstrate for them which they are differing within it, and let the disbelievers know that they were liars.

40.Samy Mahdy: It is only our say for a thing when We wanted it, “Be,” so it is.

41.Samy Mahdy: And Those who emigrated in Allah, after being oppressed, We will good settle on them in The Dunya (this world), an excellence; and the Hereafter wage is bigger, if they are knowing.

42.Samy Mahdy: Those who are patient, and upon their Lord, they are relying.

43.Samy Mahdy: And We did not send before you except men whom We revealed to them. So, ask the reminder’s people, if you were not knowing.

44.Samy Mahdy: With the proofs and the Zaboors. And We sent down to you the Reminder, that you demonstrate to the people what was sent down to them, and perhaps they may be thinking.

45.Samy Mahdy: So are those who are guiling the bad deeds, secured that Allah will collapse down the earth with them, or the torment comes to them from where they do not feel.

46.Samy Mahdy: Or will he take them in their daily activity fluctuation? So, they will not cause its incapacitation.

47.Samy Mahdy: Or He will take them upon fear? So, surely Your Lord is Kind, Merciful.

48.Samy Mahdy: Have they not seen what Allah has created among a thing? It shades its shadows, about the right and the lefts, prostrating for Allah while they are degrading.

49.Samy Mahdy: And for Allah prostrates whatever is in the skies and whatever is in the earth, among a moving creature, and the angels, and they are not arrogant.

50.Samy Mahdy: They are fearing their Lord from above them, and they are doing whatever they are commanded. ۩

51.Samy Mahdy: And Allah has said: “Do not take two Gods, Tow! He, just only, One God; so, be from me be terrifying.”

52.Samy Mahdy: And for Him whatever is in the skies and the earth; and for Him the religion is constantly. So, are you showing piety, to others than Allah?

53.Samy Mahdy: And whatever among grace with you is from Allah. Then if the harm touches you, so to Him you are groaning.

54.Samy Mahdy: Then if He uncovers the harm about you, behold! a team among you with their Lord are associating.

55.Samy Mahdy: To disbelieve with what We have given them. So, enjoy. So, you will know.

56.Samy Mahdy: And they set up, for what they do not know, a share among what we had livelihood them. By Allah, you will be questioned about what you have been slandering.

57.Samy Mahdy: And they set up for Allah the daughters, glorified is Him, and for themselves what they are desiring.

58.Samy Mahdy: And when one of them is preaching with the female, his face stays blackish, and he is a suppressor (His rage).

59.Samy Mahdy: He disappears from the kinfolk, from a bad of what he preached with it. Shall he withhold it in humiliation, or bury it secretly in the dust? Verily, bad was what they were judging.

60.Samy Mahdy: For those who are not believing in the Hereafter, is the badness example, and for Allah is the Highest Example. And He is Al-Aziz (The Almighty), Al-Hakeem (The Wise).

61.Samy Mahdy: And if Allah is taking the people with their oppression, He would not quit upon it a moving creature, but He postpones them until a named term. So, when their term comes, they will neither be delaying one hour, nor will they be advancing.

62.Samy Mahdy: And they set for Allah what they are hating, and their tongues describe the lie, that for them is the excellency. Assuredly, that for them is the Fire, and that they will be over-neglected.

63.Samy Mahdy: By Allah, We already sent (Messengers) to communities before you, so Satan prettified their works for them. So, he is their guardian Today, and for them a painful torment.

64.Samy Mahdy: And We did not send down upon you the Book except to demonstrate for them what they are differing within it, and a guidance and a mercy for a kinfolk who believe.

65.Samy Mahdy: And Allah sent down water from the sky, so with which He gives the earth life after its death. Surely, within that is a verse for a kinfolk who listen.

66.Samy Mahdy: And surely there is an admonition lesson for you in the livestock: We water you from what is within their bellies, between excretion and blood, unmixed milk, palatable for the drinkers.

67.Samy Mahdy: And from the date-palms fruitage and the grapevines, you are taking from it an intoxicant and a fine livelihood. Surely, within that is a verse for a kinfolk who reason.

68.Samy Mahdy: And your Lord revealed to the bee: “That takes homes from the mountains, and from the trees, and from what they are trellising.”

69.Samy Mahdy: Then eat from all the fruitage, so go within your Lord’s pathways, smoothly. Exit out from their bellies a varying color syrup, within it a healing for the people. Surely, within that is a verse for a kinfolk who think.

70.Samy Mahdy: And Allah created you; then He will decease you. And from you who is reversed to the oldest age, so that he will no longer know a thing, after his knowledge. Surely Allah is Knowledgeable, Competent.

71.Samy Mahdy: Allah has favored some of you over some others in livelihood. So, those who are favored would not hand over their livelihood to those whom their right hands are possessing, so that they would be equal in it. So, is it with Allah’s graces they are denying?

72.Samy Mahdy: And Allah has set up for you among yourselves spouses; and set up for you from your spouses, sons and grandchildren; and had livelihood for you among the good things. So will they by the invalid they are believing, and by Allah’s grace disbelieving?

73.Samy Mahdy: And they worshiped without Allah what does not own for them a livelihood from the skies, and the earth of a thing, and they are unable.

74.Samy Mahdy: So do not cite the examples for Allah. Surely Allah knows, and you are not knowing.

75.Samy Mahdy: Allah cites an example of an owned slave, who is unable upon a thing; and whom We had livelihood from Us a finest livelihood, so he spends from it secretly and publicly. Are they equal? All praise for Allah nay, but most of them are not knowing.

76.Samy Mahdy: And Allah cited an example of two men: one of them dumb, is unable upon a thing, and he is a burden on his guardian; whichever way he directs him, he does not come with a goodness. Is he equal with him who commands, with justice, and is on a straight path?

77.Samy Mahdy: And for Allah is the skies’ unseen and the earth. And the Hour’s command is not except, like the sight’s glance, or even nearer. Surely Allah is over everything competent.

78.Samy Mahdy: And Allah exited you out from your mothers’ bellies, not knowing a thing; and He set up for you the hearing, and the sight, and the hearts; perhaps you may be thanking.

79.Samy Mahdy: Have they not seen the birds, subservient in the sky’s atmosphere? None withholds them except Allah. Surely, within that is verses for a kinfolk who believe.

80.Samy Mahdy: And Allah has set up for you from your homes a calmness and has set up for you from the livestock’s leathers homes, would be light on you on your travel day, and on your staying day; and among their wool, and fur, and hair, furnishings and enjoyment till a while.

81.Samy Mahdy: And Allah has set up for you shade from what He has created and has set up for you from the mountains’ stashes, and has set up for you garments to protect you from the hotness, and garments to protect you from your violence. Thus, He completes His graces upon you, perhaps you may be submitting.

82.Samy Mahdy: So, if they turned away, it was only upon you the obvious notification.

83.Samy Mahdy: They recognize Allah’s graces, then they deny it, and most of them are the infidels.

84.Samy Mahdy: And on a Day when We will mission a witness from every community, then those who disbelieved will not be permitted (excuse), nor they be admonished (to appease God).

85.Samy Mahdy: And if those who oppressed saw the torment, so it will not be lightened about them, nor respited.

86.Samy Mahdy: And if those who are associating saw their associates, they said, “Our Lord, these are our associates whom we were calling without You.” So, they threw back to them the saying, “You are liars.”

87.Samy Mahdy: And they threw to Allah on that Day the submission, and strayed from them what they were slandering.

88.Samy Mahdy: Those who disbelieved and hindered Allah's pathway, We increased them a torment over the torment, with what they were spoiling.

89.Samy Mahdy: And on a Day when We will raise in every community a witness against them, among themselves, and brought with you as a witness against these. And We sent down upon you the Book, as a declaration for everything, and a guidance, and a mercy and preach (good tidings) for the Muslims.

90.Samy Mahdy: Surely Allah commands with the justice, and the excellence conduct, and giving the possessors of consanguinity. And He prohibits obscenity, and the denial, and the transgressing. He exhorts you, perhaps you may be remembering.

91.Samy Mahdy: And fulfill Allah's covenant if you covenant and do not break the oaths after emphasizing them. And you already have set up Allah upon you as sponsor, surely Allah knows what you are doing.

92.Samy Mahdy: And do not be like her who unravels her yarn, after it was strong in renege. You are taking your oaths as deception between you, to be one community is more growing than another community. Surely Allah is trying you with it. And He will demonstrate for you, on The Resurrection Day, what you were within it differing.

93.Samy Mahdy: And if Allah willed, He would set up you one community, but He strays whom He wills, and He guides whom He wills. And you will be questioned about what you were working on.

94.Samy Mahdy: And do not take your oaths as deception between you, so a foot will slip after its firming, and taste the badness with what you avert from Allah’s pathway, and for you a great torment.

95.Samy Mahdy: And do not purchase with Allah’s covenant for a little price. Surely what is with Allah is a goodness for you, if you are knowing.

96.Samy Mahdy: What you have would be depleted, but what is with Allah remains. And We will recompense those who are patient, their wages with the best of what they were working.

97.Samy Mahdy: Whoever worked righteous, whether male or female, while being a believer, We will give him a good life, and We will recompense them their wage with the best of what they were working.

98.Samy Mahdy: So, if you read the Quran. So, seek incantation with Allah from the outcast Satan.

99.Samy Mahdy: Surely, he has no Sultan over those who believed, and, on their Lord, they are relying.

100.Samy Mahdy: Surely His Sultan is only upon those who ally him and those who by him (Allah) are associating.

101.Samy Mahdy: And if We substituted a verse in place of a verse, and Allah is knower with what He sends down, they said, “You are only a slanderer.” Nay, but most of them are not knowing.

102.Samy Mahdy: Say, “The holy Spirit has descended it down from your Lord, with the right, to stabilize those who believed, and a guidance and a preach (good tidings) for the Muslims.”

103.Samy Mahdy: And We already have knowledge that they are saying, “Surely he teaches him only humankind.” The tongue of the one whom they atheist to, him is a foreigner and this is an obvious Arabic tongue.

104.Samy Mahdy: Surely those who are not believing with Allah’s verses, Allah does not guide them, and for them is a painful torment.

105.Samy Mahdy: Surely, they are only slandering the lie, those who are not believing with Allah’s verses. And those are the liars.

106.Samy Mahdy: Whoever disbelieved with Allah after his believing, except who is forced, while his core was tranquilized by the faith. But, whoever his chest was enraptured by the infidelity, so upon them anger from Allah, and for them is a great torment.

107.Samy Mahdy: That is because they have loved the Dunya (worldly) life more than the Hereafter, and surely Allah does not guide the infidel kinfolk.

108.Samy Mahdy: Those are whom Allah has imprinted on, their cores and their hearings, and their sights. And those are the inattentive ones.

109.Samy Mahdy: Assuredly that they are in The Hereafter, the losers.

110.Samy Mahdy: Then surely your Lord, for those who emigrated after being infatuated, then efforted and be patient, surely your Lord thereafter is Forgiver, Merciful.

111.Samy Mahdy: On a Day when every soul will come arguing about itself, and every soul will fulfill what it has worked for, and they are not being oppressed.

112.Samy Mahdy: And Allah cited an example of a village that was secured and tranquil, its livelihood coming to it abundantly from every place. So, it disbelieved with Allah’s grace, so Allah made them taste the hunger’s apparel and the fear, with what they were making.

113.Samy Mahdy: And already a messenger among them had come to them, but they falsified him, so the torment took them while they were oppressors.

114.Samy Mahdy: So, eat among what Allah had livelihood for you Halal and good things, and be thankful for Allah’s graces, if you are to Him worshiping.

115.Samy Mahdy: Surely, He has only forbidden upon you the dead, and the blood, and the swine flesh, and what was dedicated with it to rather than Allah. So, whoever is compelled neither a transgressor nor exceeder, So, surely Allah is Forgiver, Merciful.

116.Samy Mahdy: And do not say for what your tongues describe, the lie, “This is Halal, and this is forbidden,” to slander the lies upon Allah. Surely those who are slandering upon Allah the lie, are not gaining.

117.Samy Mahdy: A little enjoyment, and for them a painful torment.

118.Samy Mahdy: And upon those who are Jews, We have forbidden what We storified upon you before. And We did not oppress them, but themselves they were oppressing.

119.Samy Mahdy: Then your Lord for those who worked the bad with ignorance, then they repented after that and repaired, surely your Lord thereafter is Forgiver, Merciful.

120.Samy Mahdy: Surely Abraham was an Ummah (Goodness Leader), devoutly obedient to Allah, a monotheist, and was not among the polytheists.

121.Samy Mahdy: Thankful of His graces. He elected him and guided him to a straight path.

122.Samy Mahdy: And We gave him in the Dunya (world) an excellence, and he is in the Hereafter be among the righteous.

123.Samy Mahdy: Then We revealed to you: “That follows Abraham’s creed, Monotheist. He was not among the polytheists.”

124.Samy Mahdy: Surely the Sabbath was set up only upon those who differed within it. And Your Lord will judge between them on The Resurrection Day in what they within it were differing.

125.Samy Mahdy: Call to your Lord’s pathway with wisdom and the excellent exhortation and argue with them by which it is best. Surely Your Lord is knower with whoever astray about His pathway, and He is knower with the guided ones.

126.Samy Mahdy: And if you punish, so punish with the like of what you were punished with. And if you are patient, it is good for the patient ones.

127.Samy Mahdy: And be patient. And your patience is only with Allah. And do not grieve upon them, and not be in distress with what they are guiling.

128.Samy Mahdy: Surely Allah is with those who show piety and those who are benefactors.

1.Samy Mahdy: Glorified is the one who journeyed His servant by night, from the Sacred Mosque to the Farthest Mosque, which We have blessed around it, to show him from Our verses that He is Al-Sameeau (The Hearing), Al-Basser (The Seer).

2.Samy Mahdy: And We gave Moses the Book and set it as guidance for Israel's children: Do not take without Me a trustee.

3.Samy Mahdy: An offspring among whoever We carried with Noah. Surely, He was a thankful slave.

4.Samy Mahdy: And We decreed to Israel's children in the Book: You will spoil in earth twice, and you will be high grand haughtiness.

5.Samy Mahdy: So, if the first promise of them has come, We missioned against you slaves of Ours, possessor of severe military might, so they probed through the homes. And it was a done promise.

6.Samy Mahdy: Then We returned for you the repetition against them, and supplied you with money and sons, and set up you more advanced fighters (And more toots).

7.Samy Mahdy: If you excelled, you excel for yourselves; and if you did bad, so it is against it. So, if the last promise comes, they will sadden your faces, and will enter the Masjid as they entered it the first time, and they will be smashed, what they get high over it a destroying’ smash.

8.Samy Mahdy: Perhaps your Lord may mercified you. And if you return, We will return. And We set up Gohanam (Hell) for the infidels as a prison-bed.

9.Samy Mahdy: Surely this Quran guides for which is most established; and it preaches (Good tidings) the believers who are working the righteous deeds, that for them a grand wage.

10.Samy Mahdy: And surely those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have prepared for them a painful torment.

11.Samy Mahdy: And the human is calling with the evil as his calling with the goodness. And the human was ever hasty.

12.Samy Mahdy: And We set up the night and the day, two verses. So, We erased the night verse, and set up the day verse visible, to seek a bounty from your Lord, and know the lunar years’ numbers, and the calculation. And everything We detailed it, in detailing.

13.Samy Mahdy: And every human We have obliged him, his bird omen in his neck. And on The Resurrection Day, We exit out for him a Book which he will find it was propagated.

14.Samy Mahdy: “Read your Book; Sufficient is yourself against you on this Day as a reckoner.”

15.Samy Mahdy: Whoever is guided, so he is guided for himself. And whoever strayed, so he strayed against it. And no bearer of a burden will bear a burden of another, and We were not torturing until We will mission a messenger.

16.Samy Mahdy: And if We want to destroy a village, We command its luxuriant ones, so they are debauching in it, so the saying upon it was truthed, So We devastated it the most, devastation.

17.Samy Mahdy: And how many among the generations have We destroyed, after Noah? And sufficient is your Lord by his slaves’ misdeeds as Expert, Seer.

18.Samy Mahdy: Whoever wants the urgent (Life), We hasten for him within it whatever We will, for whomever We want. Then We set up Gohanam for him (Hell), he will be flamed by it, dishonored, defeated.

19.Samy Mahdy: And whoever wanted the Hereafter, and strived to it, its striving, while he is a believer; so, those whose striving were thanked.

20.Samy Mahdy: Both, these and these, We extend from your Lord’s grant. And your Lord’s grant was not restricted.

21.Samy Mahdy: Observe how We have favored some of them over some others; and the Hereafter is greater in degrees, and grander in preferment.

22.Samy Mahdy: Do not set up with Allah another god, so you sit dishonored and discouraged.

23.Samy Mahdy: And Your Lord has decreed that you are not worshiping except Him, and with the parents do benefaction. If one of them or both of them reach old age with you, do not say for them "Uff,", nor rebuke them, and say for them a noble saying.

24.Samy Mahdy: And lower for them the lowness’ wing, from the mercy, and say, “My Lord, mercified them, as they raised me when I was small.”

25.Samy Mahdy: Your Lord is more knower, with what is in your souls. If you are righteous, so surely, He is ever for the often returning [to Him], Forgiving.

26.Samy Mahdy: And give the possessors of consanguinity his rights, and the needy persons, and the wayfarer, and do not squander, a squandering.

27.Samy Mahdy: Surely the squanderers were the devils’ brethren, and the devil was for his Lord, an infidel.

28.Samy Mahdy: But if you turn away from them, seeking mercy from your Lord which you expect for, so say for them an easy saying.

29.Samy Mahdy: And do not set up your hand chained to your neck, nor extend it all the extension, so you sit blamed, regretful.

30.Samy Mahdy: Surely Your Lord extends the livelihood for whomever He wills and quantifies it. Surely, He is ever with His slaves an Expert, Seer.

31.Samy Mahdy: And do not kill your progeny for the awe of destitution. We provide livelihood for them, and you. Surely their killing was a grand mistake.

32.Samy Mahdy: And do not approach adultery. Surely it was obscenity, and a bad pathway.

33.Samy Mahdy: And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except with the right. And whoever is being killed in oppression, so We set up for his guardian a Sultan. So, he should not be extravagant in killing. Surely, he is victorious.

34.Samy Mahdy: And do not approach the orphan’s money, except with which is the best, until he has reached his strength. And by the covenant, fulfill surely the covenant would be questioned about.

35.Samy Mahdy: And fulfill the volume measure when you measure, and weigh with the straight balance scales. That is goodness and an excellent endeavor.

36.Samy Mahdy: And do not pursue what you have no knowledge with. Surely the hearing, and the sight, and the heart, all of those will be questioned about.

37.Samy Mahdy: And do not walk on the earth hilariously. You are neither piercing the earth, nor you reach the mountains in height.

38.Samy Mahdy: All of that was a bad deed with your Lord, hatred.

39.Samy Mahdy: That is from what your Lord has revealed to you, among the wisdom. And do not set up with Allah another god, so you will be thrown in Gohanam (Hell), blamed, vanquished.

40.Samy Mahdy: Has your Lord selected you by the sons, and He took from the angels females? You surely say a massive saying.

41.Samy Mahdy: And We already diversified in this Quran, to let them remember, but it does not increase them except a revulsion.

42.Samy Mahdy: Say, “If there were with Him other gods, as they say, then they would strive to the Throne’s possessor, a pathway.”

43.Samy Mahdy: Glorified is Him, and Exalted above what they are saying, a grand highness.

44.Samy Mahdy: For Him the seven skies glorify, and the earth, and whoever is in them. And none among a thing except it glorifies with His praises, but you are not understanding their glorification. Surely, He is ever A Clement, Forgiver.

45.Samy Mahdy: And if you read the Quran, We set up between you and those who are not believing with the Hereafter an invisible veil.

46.Samy Mahdy: And We set up upon their cores, shields lest they understand it, and in their ears a load. And when you mention your Lord alone in the Quran, they turn their backs in a revulsion.

47.Samy Mahdy: We are more knower, with what they are listening with, when they are listening to you, and when they are secreting consultation, when the oppressors are saying, “You are not following except a man bewitched.”

48.Samy Mahdy: Look how they cited for you the examples. So, they strayed, so they could not find a pathway.

49.Samy Mahdy: And they say, “Are we, when becoming bones and remnants, we will be raised as a new creation?”

50.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Be stones or iron.

51.Samy Mahdy: Or a creation from what is bigging in your chests.” So, they will be saying, “Who will return us?” Say, “The One who originated you the first time.” So, they will be nodding their heads toward you, and be saying, “When is it?” Say, “Perhaps that will be soon.”

52.Samy Mahdy: On a Day when He is calling you, so you respond with His praise, and you assume that you tarried except a little.

53.Samy Mahdy: And say for My slaves to say which is the best. Surely Satan obsesses between them. Surely Satan is for humans an obvious enemy.

54.Samy Mahdy: Your Lord is a knower with you. If He wills, He mercifies you; and if He wills, He tortures you. And We did not send you upon them as a trustee.

55.Samy Mahdy: And Your Lord is a knower with whoever is in the skies and the earth. And We have preferred some of the prophets over some others; and to David We gave the Psalms (Zabora).

56.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Call those who you are claiming without Him. So, they are not owning to uncovering the harm from you, nor diverting it.”

57.Samy Mahdy: Those who are called, they are seeking to their Lord the means of approach, which of them be nearer, and expecting for His mercy, and fearing of His torment. Surely your Lord’s torment is being cautioned.

58.Samy Mahdy: And none among a village except We are destroying it before The Resurrection Day or torturing it with a severe torment. That was written in lines in the Book.

59.Samy Mahdy: And nothing prevented us from sending by the verses except that the formers falsified them. And We gave Thamud the She-camel, visibly, so they oppressed it. And We do not send the verses except for Intimidation.

60.Samy Mahdy: And when We said to you, surely your Lord encompasses the people. And We did not set up the vision which We showed you, except as an infatuation for the people, and the cursed tree in the Quran. And We intimidate them, so it does not increase them except a grand tyranny.

61.Samy Mahdy: And when We said for the angels, “Prostrate for Adam,” so they are prostrating, except Iblis. He said, “Shall I prostrate for whom You created from clay?"

62.Samy Mahdy: He said, “I will see you this, the one whom you have honored over me? If you postpone me till The Resurrection Day, I will be cunning his offspring, except a few.”

63.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Go! So, whoever among them follows you, so surely Gohanam (Hell) is your penalty, an ample penalty.”

64.Samy Mahdy: “And spur whomever among them you can with your voice, and fetch against them with your horses and your walking men, and share them, within the money and the progeny, and promise them.” And Satan does not promise them except a vanity.

65.Samy Mahdy: “Surely My slaves, you have not over them a Sultan.” And is sufficient with your Lord as trustee.

66.Samy Mahdy: Your Lord is the one who propels for you the arks in the sea, to seek among His bounty. Surely, He is ever with you, a Merciful.

67.Samy Mahdy: And if the harm touched you in the sea, strayed whoever you are calling except Him. So, when He saved you to the land, you turned away. And the human was being infidel (unthankful).

68.Samy Mahdy: So have you secured that He would collapse down a side of the land with you, or send upon you a stone storm, then you will not find for you a trustee?

69.Samy Mahdy: Or have you secured that He returns you into it another time, so He sends upon you a hurricane of the wind, so He drowns you with what you disbelieved? Then you will not find for you against us with it, a follower.

70.Samy Mahdy: And We already honored Adam's children, and carried them in the land and the sea, and had livelihood them from the good things, and preferred them over much among what We have created, a preference.

71.Samy Mahdy: On a Day when We call each people, with their leader (Imam). So, whoever is given his book with his right hand. So, those are reading their book, and not being oppressed [even] as much as a thread [inside the date seed].

72.Samy Mahdy: And whoever is blind in this, so he is in the Hereafter a blind, and more astray pathway.

73.Samy Mahdy: And surely, they almost infatuate you about which We have revealed to you, to slander upon us, other than it. And then they would have taken you as an intimate friend.

74.Samy Mahdy: And unless that we stabilized you, you have almost cornered, already to them a little thing.

75.Samy Mahdy: Then We will let you taste a double of the life, and a double of the death; then you will not find for you against us a victory supporter.

76.Samy Mahdy: And surely, they almost provoked you from the earth, to exit you out of it. And hence, they would not be tarried behind you, except a little.

77.Samy Mahdy: A route (Sunnah) of whoever We already sent before you from our messengers. And you will not find, for our routes (Sunnah), a diversion.

78.Samy Mahdy: Establish the prayers at the sun’s decline, until the night darkness; and the dawn’s Quran. Surely the dawn’s Quran is witnessed.

79.Samy Mahdy: And, among the night, so pray (Tahajud) with it, as supererogatory for you. Perhaps your Lord missions you, a praised stature.

80.Samy Mahdy: And say, “My Lord, enter me a truth entry, and exit me a truth exit, and set up for me from your presence a victory supporter Sultan.”

81.Samy Mahdy: And say, “the right has come, and the invalid has vanished; surely the invalid is ever vanishing.”

82.Samy Mahdy: And We send down among the Quran which is a heal and a mercy for the believers, and it does not increase the oppressors except a loss.

83.Samy Mahdy: And if We graced upon the human, he turned away and distanced by his side. And if evil has touched him, he is despairing.

84.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Each works upon his trend. So, Your Lord is a knower with who has the most guided pathway.”

85.Samy Mahdy: And they ask you about the Spirit. Say, “The Spirit is from my Lord’s command; and you were not given from the knowledge except a little.”

86.Samy Mahdy: If We willed, We would go away with which We revealed to you. Then you will not find for you with it against Us, a trustee.

87.Samy Mahdy: Except a mercy from your Lord. Surely His bounty upon you is ever grand.

88.Samy Mahdy: Say, “If the humans and the jinn gathered upon that they bring with the alike of this - the Quran, they would not bring with the alike of it, even if some of them were backing up for some others.”

89.Samy Mahdy: And We have already diversified for the people in this - the Quran, from each example, so most of the people refused except an infidelity.

90.Samy Mahdy: And they said, “We will not believe for you until you burst for us among the earth, a spring.

91.Samy Mahdy: Or being for you a paradise of palms and vines; so, you burst the rivers through it bursting.

92.Samy Mahdy: Or you fall the sky as you claim, upon us in fragments, or bring with Allah and the angels opposite us.

93.Samy Mahdy: Or be for you a golden adorned house. Or you ascend into the sky. And we will not believe in your ascension, unless you descend down upon us a book, we will read it.” Say, “Glorified is my Lord. Am I (anything other than) humankind messenger?”

94.Samy Mahdy: And what prevented the people from believing when the guidance came to them except that they said, "Has Allah missioned a humankind messenger?"

95.Samy Mahdy: Say, “If on the earth were angels, walking tranquilly, We would have sent down to them from the sky an angel messenger.”

96.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Allah is sufficient as a witness between you and between me. Surely, He is ever with His slaves, Expert, Seer.”

97.Samy Mahdy: And whoever Allah guides, he is the guided one. And whomever He strays, so you will not find for them guardians without Him. And We will muster them on The Resurrection Day, upon their faces, blind, dumb, and deaf. Their shelter is Gohanam (Hell); whenever it subsides, We increase them in a blaze fire.

98.Samy Mahdy: That is their penalty, because they disbelieved in Our verses and said, “Shall we, when we become bones and remnants, will we be raised up as a new creation?”

99.Samy Mahdy: Have they not seen that Allah, the one Who created the skies and the earth, is Able to create the like of them? And He sets up for them a term, no doubt in it. So, the oppressors refuse except for infidelity.

100.Samy Mahdy: Say, “If you are owning the treasuries of my Lord’s mercy, then you would withhold in awe of the spending.” And the human is ever Niggardly.

101.Samy Mahdy: And We gave Moses nine obvious verses, so ask Israel's children. When he came to them. So, Pharaoh said to him, “I assume that you, Moses, are bewitched.”

102.Samy Mahdy: He said, “You already know that none sent these down except the skies Lord and the earth as insights; and I assume that you, Pharaoh, are perishable.”

103.Samy Mahdy: So, he wanted to provoke them from the earth, so We drowned him, and those with him, altogether.

104.Samy Mahdy: And We said after him for Israel's children, “Reside the earth, so when the Hereafter promise comes, We will bring you all as a mixed crowd.”

105.Samy Mahdy: And with the right We sent it down, and with the right it descended. And We did not send you except as a preacher and a warner.

106.Samy Mahdy: And a Quran which We separated it, to read it upon the people at intervals. And We downloaded its revelation! a download.

107.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Believe by it, or do not believe.” Surely those who were given the knowledge before it, when it is recited upon them, they fall down to their chins, prostrating. .۩

108.Samy Mahdy: And they are saying, “Glorified is our Lord. Surely our Lord’s promise was to be done.”

109.Samy Mahdy: And they fall down to their chins, weeping, and it increases them humbling.

110.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Call Allah, or call Al-Rahman (The Widely merciful). Whichever you call, so for Him are the Excellence Names.” And neither be loud in your prayer, nor faint by it, and seek between that pathway.

111.Samy Mahdy: And say, “The Praise for Allah, who did not take a son, and was not for Him a partner in The Sovereignty, and He was not for Him a guardian from the Humiliation, and aggrandize him aggrandization.”

1.Samy Mahdy: The praise for Allah, the one who sent down the Book upon His slave, and He did not set up for it a crookedness.

2.Samy Mahdy: Valuable to warn of severe adversity from His presence; and to preach (Good tidings) the believers who are working the righteous deeds, that for them is a finest wage.

3.Samy Mahdy: They are abiding therein forever.

4.Samy Mahdy: And to warn those who said, “Allah has taken a son.”

5.Samy Mahdy: Not for them by it, of knowledge, nor did their forefathers. Bigged is a word that exits out from their mouths. Surely, they are not saying, except a lie.

6.Samy Mahdy: So, perhaps you overpower yourself on their effects, if they do not believe in this- the narration- sorrowfully.

7.Samy Mahdy: Surely, We set up what is on the earth an adornment for it, to try them, which of them is the best work.

8.Samy Mahdy: And surely, We will set up what is on it, a barren ground.

9.Samy Mahdy: Or you assumed that the Cave’s companions and (Al-Raqeem) the Inscription were, from Our verses, a wonder?

10.Samy Mahdy: When the guys sheltered toward the cave. So, they said, “Our Lord, give us from Your presence, a mercy, and accommodate for us from our matter a righteous guidance.”

11.Samy Mahdy: So, We smote upon their ears in the cave for a number of lunar years.

12.Samy Mahdy: Then We raised them up to know which of the two parties better enumerated for what they have tarried a period?
