81.Samy Mahdy: And for Solomon the wind storming, running with his command towards the land which We have blessed within it. And We are, with everything, knowledgeable.

82.Samy Mahdy: And from the devil's who dives for him, and works a work other than that, a work. And We were for them, a keeper.

83.Samy Mahdy: And Job (Ayup), when he called out to his Lord: “That the harm has touched me, and you are The Most Merciful of the merciful ones.”

84.Samy Mahdy: So We responded to him, so We uncovered what was with him of harm, and We gave him his family, and their alike with them as a mercy from us, and a reminder for the worshipers.

85.Samy Mahdy: And Ishmael, Enoch (Edrees), and Ezekiel (Dhul-Kifl); all were from the patient ones.

86.Samy Mahdy: And We entered them into our mercy. Surely, they were among the righteous.

87.Samy Mahdy: And Jonah, when he went out in fury, so he thinks that We will not destiny upon him. So, he called out in the darkness, “Surely there is no God except You! Glorified are You! Surely I was among the oppressors!”

88.Samy Mahdy: So We responded to him, and We saved him from the sorrow. And thus, We saved the believers.

89.Samy Mahdy: And Zechariah, when he called out to his Lord, “My Lord, do not leave me singular, and you are the Best of inheritors.”

90.Samy Mahdy: So We responded to him and endowed him, John. And We repaired his wife for him. Surely, they were hastening in goodness, and they were calling Us willingly and terrifyingly, and they were in awe of Us.

91.Samy Mahdy: And she, the one who fortified her genitalia. So, We blew within her, among our spirit, and set up her and her son a verse for the worlds.

92.Samy Mahdy: Surely is this your community, a one community, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.

93.Samy Mahdy: And they cut their matter between them. All are returning to Us.

94.Samy Mahdy: So, whoever works among the righteous deeds, and he is a believer, so there is no denying of his striving. And We are writing it down for him.

95.Samy Mahdy: And it is forbidden upon a village, We had destroyed it, that they shall not be returning.

96.Samy Mahdy: Until, if Gog and Magog are opened, and they are from every hump swarming down.

97.Samy Mahdy: And the right promise has neared. So, those who disbelieved, their eyes are staring: “Woe to us. We were already inattentive from this. Nay, but we were oppressors.”

98.Samy Mahdy: You and what you are worshiping without Allah are Gohanam Stones. You are for it, will be incoming.

99.Samy Mahdy: If these were Gods, they would not be incoming to it. And all are therein immortals.

100.Samy Mahdy: For them therein, exhalation. And they are therein not being heard.

101.Samy Mahdy: Surely those who proceeded for them the excellency from Us, those are deportees about it.

102.Samy Mahdy: They will not hear its hissing, and they are within what their souls are desiring, immortals.

103.Samy Mahdy: The Grandest Dismay will not grieve them, and the angels welcome them: “This is your Day which you were promising.”

104.Samy Mahdy: On a Day when We fold the sky, like the record is folding the books. Just as We start first creation, We will repeat it, a promise upon us. Surely, We are doing.

105.Samy Mahdy: And We already have written in the Psalms (Al-Zabor), from after the Reminder, that my righteous slaves will inherit the earth.

106.Samy Mahdy: Surely, in this a notification for kinfolk who worship.

107.Samy Mahdy: And We did not send you except as mercy for the worlds.

108.Samy Mahdy: Say, “It is only revealed to me that your God is One God. So, will you be submitting (Muslims)?”

109.Samy Mahdy: So, if they turned away, say, “I have warned you in equality. And I do not cognize whether it is near or far, what you have been promised.”

110.Samy Mahdy: Surely, He knows the loudness among the saying, and He knows what you are muting.

111.Samy Mahdy: “And I do not cognize, perhaps it is an infatuation for you, and an enjoyment for a while.”

112.Samy Mahdy: Say, “My Lord, judge with the right.” And “Our Lord is Al-Rahman (The Widely merciful), Al-Mustaan (The Helper) against what you are describing.”

1.Samy Mahdy: O the people, show the piety of your Lord. Surely the Hour’s quaking is a great thing.

2.Samy Mahdy: On a Day when you see it: every lactating mother will be dazed about what she is lactating, and every possessor of pregnancy will deliver her gestation, and you will see the people are drunken, while they are not drunk, but Allah’s torment is severe.

3.Samy Mahdy: And among the people whoever argues in Allah without knowledge and follows every rebellious devil.

4.Samy Mahdy: It was written upon him, that whoever he was a guardian of him, so he would astray him, and guide him to the Blaze torment.

5.Samy Mahdy: O the people! If you are in doubt from the raising, so We created you from dust, then from a sperm drop, then from a clinging clot, then from an embryonic lump, created and uncreated, to demonstrate for you. And We settle down within the wombs whatever We will till a named term, then We exit you out as baby, then you will reach your full strength. And from you who decease, and from you who will restore to the feeblest old age, so that he will not know a thing, after having knowledge. And you see the earth quiescent; so, when We send down water upon it, it vibrates, and swells, and plants from among every joyful beautiful pair.

6.Samy Mahdy: That is because Allah is the right, and that He gives the dead life, and that He is over everything competent.

7.Samy Mahdy: And surely the Hour is coming, there is no doubt in it, and surely Allah will raise whoever is in the graves.

8.Samy Mahdy: And among the people whoever argues in Allah without a knowledge, nor a guidance, nor an illuminating Book.

9.Samy Mahdy: Twisting his neck [in arrogance], to astray about Allah’s pathway. For him in the Dunya (World) is disgrace, and We let him taste on The Resurrection Day the Burn torment.

10.Samy Mahdy: That is with what your hands have forwarded, and surely Allah is not an oppressor for the slaves.

11.Samy Mahdy: And among the people is he who worships Allah upon edge. So, if he is inflicted with goodness, he is tranquil with it. And if he is inflicted with an infatuation, he turns over upon his face. He has lost [The Dunya] world and the Hereafter. That is the obvious loss.

12.Samy Mahdy: He calls, without Allah, what is neither harming him nor benefiting him. That is the farthest astray.

13.Samy Mahdy: He calls for whom his harm is closer than his benefit. How wretched is the guardian? And how wretched is the chum.

14.Samy Mahdy: Surely Allah enters those who believed and worked the righteous deeds paradises beneath which the rivers are running. Surely Allah does whatever He wills.

15.Samy Mahdy: Whoever was assuming that Allah will not victory him in the Dunya and the Hereafter, so let him extend with a reason to the sky, then cut off, so he observes, does his plan go away what enrages him.

16.Samy Mahdy: And thus We sent it down, obvious verses, and surely Allah guides whomever He wills.

17.Samy Mahdy: Surely those who believed, and those who are Jewish, and the Sabeans, and the Christians, and the Magians, and the Polytheists, surely Allah will decisively adjudicate between them on The Resurrection Day. Surely Allah is over everything, a Witness.

18.Samy Mahdy: Have you not seen that Allah prostrates for Him whoever is in the skies and whoever is in the earth, and the sun, and the moon, and the stars, and the mountains, and the trees, and the creatures, and many of the people? And much was truthed upon him the torment. And whomever Allah humiliates, so for him none is giving honor. Surely Allah does whatever He wills..۩

19.Samy Mahdy: These are two adversaries disputed within their Lord. So, those who disbelieved, were cutting for them clothes among fire, poured from above their heads the scalding water.

20.Samy Mahdy: With it is melted what was within their bellies and the skins.

21.Samy Mahdy: And for them are hooked rods of iron.

22.Samy Mahdy: Whenever they wanted to exit out of it from sorrow, they returned back within it. And taste the burn torment.”

23.Samy Mahdy: Surely Allah enters those who believed and worked the righteous deeds into paradises beneath which the rivers are running. They will be ornamented therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their garments therein will be silk.

24.Samy Mahdy: And they guided toward the good things among the speech. And they guided toward the Most Praised (Al-Hameed) path.

25.Samy Mahdy: Surely those who disbelieved and hinder Allah's pathway and the Sacred Mosque, which We set up for the people equally whether the residing therein or the passing through, and whoever wants atheist within it with oppression, We will make him taste among a painful torment.

26.Samy Mahdy: And when We settled to Abraham the House’s place: “That you do not associate anything with me; and “Purify My House for the circumambulating ones, and the standing ones, and the kneeling ones, the prostrating ones.”

27.Samy Mahdy: And announce within the people, with the pilgrimage. They will come to you on foot, and upon every lean camel. They will come among every deep gorge.

28.Samy Mahdy: To witness benefits for them, and mention Allah’s name in known days over what He had livelihood them from the animal livestock. So, eat from it, and feed the miserable, the poor.

29.Samy Mahdy: Then let them complete their prescribed duties (Rites of Hajj), and fulfill their vows, and to circumambulate around with the Ancient House.

30.Samy Mahdy: That, and whoever venerates Allah’s forbidden, so it is goodness for him with his Lord. And all the livestock are permitted (Halal) for you, except what is recited upon you. So, avoid the abomination from the idols, and avoid the perjury’s say.

31.Samy Mahdy: Monotheist for Allah, not associating with Him. And whoever associates with Allah, it is as though he has fallout from the sky, so he is snatched by the birds, or is plummeted by the wind to an abysmal place.

32.Samy Mahdy: That, and whoever venerates Allah’s symbols, so it is from the core's piety.

33.Samy Mahdy: For you within them are benefits till a named term. Then their place is toward the Ancient House.

34.Samy Mahdy: And We set up a rite for every community, to mention Allah’s name over what He had livelihood them from the livestock animals. So, your God is One God, so for Him submit, and preach (Good tidings) to the reverenced ones.

35.Samy Mahdy: Those who, when Allah is mentioned, their cores feel fear, and the patient ones upon what had inflicted them, and the prayers establishers and among what We had livelihood them, they are spending.

36.Samy Mahdy: And the bulks (The Camels and Cattle) We set them up for you among Allah’s symbols. In them is goodness for you. So, mention Allah’s name upon them as they line up. So, if they have fallen dead on their sides, eat from them and feed the contented man and the beggar. Thus, We have subserviated them for you, perhaps you may be thankful.

37.Samy Mahdy: Allah neither will obtain their flesh, nor their blood. But He will obtain piety from you. Thus, He subserviated them for you, to aggrandize Allah upon what He has guided you. And preach (Good tidings) the benefactors.

38.Samy Mahdy: Surely Allah defends those who believed. Surely Allah does not love every infidel traitor.

39.Samy Mahdy: It was permitted for those who are fighting because they were oppressed, and Allah is on their victory, is competent.

40.Samy Mahdy: Those who were brought out from their homes without right, except that they are saying, “Our Lord is Allah.” Unless Allah thrust some of the people with some others: there would have been demolished monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques within which Allah’s name is much mentioned. And Allah will give victory to whoever victories Him. Surely Allah is Strong, Mighty.

41.Samy Mahdy: Those who, when We enabled them in the earth, they established the prayers, and gave the Zakat, and commanded with the well-known, and forbad about the denial. And for Allah is the matter's consequence.

42.Samy Mahdy: If they falsified you, so already they falsified before them Noah’s kinfolk, Aad, and Thamud.

43.Samy Mahdy: And Abraham’s kinfolk, and Lot’s kinfolk.

44.Samy Mahdy: And Midian’s accompanies. And Moses was falsified. So, I respite for the infidels, then I took them. So how was My reproach?

45.Samy Mahdy: So, how many among a village we destroyed, while it was oppressive? So, it collapsed upon its trellises and an inoperative well and a well- built palace.

46.Samy Mahdy: So have they not walked on the earth, so it will be for them cores with which they reason, or ears to listen with it? So, it does not blind the sights, but it blinds the cores, which are within the chests.

47.Samy Mahdy: And they hasten you with torment. And Allah will never break His promise. And surely a day with your Lord is like a thousand lunar years from what you are counting.

48.Samy Mahdy: And how many from a village I have respite for it, while it was oppressive? Then I took it. And to Me is The Destiny.

49.Samy Mahdy: Say, “O the people, I am only an obvious warner, for you.”

50.Samy Mahdy: So, those who believed and worked the righteous deeds, for them is forgiveness and a noble livelihood.

51.Samy Mahdy: And those who strived in Our verses to cause incapacitation of them, those are the Hellfire’s companions.

52.Samy Mahdy: And We were not sent among a messenger nor a prophet before you, except whenever he had a wish, The Satan threw into his wishes. So, Allah supersedes what Satan has thrown, then Allah judges His verses. And Allah is Knowledgeable, Wise.

53.Samy Mahdy: He will set what Satan throws as an infatuation for those who in their cores a disease, and who their hearts are cruel. And surely the oppressors are, in far split.

54.Samy Mahdy: And those who have been given the knowledge shall know that it is the right from your Lord, so they shall be believing in it, so their cores reverence to it. And surely Allah will guide those who are believed to a straight path.

55.Samy Mahdy: And those who disbelieved are still within skepticism from it, until the Hour comes upon them unexpectedly, or there comes to them a Barren Day Torment.

56.Samy Mahdy: The Sovereignty on that Day is for Allah; He judges between them. So, those who believed and worked the righteous deeds are in The Bliss Paradises.

57.Samy Mahdy: And those who disbelieved and falsified with Our verses, so those for them a humiliating torment.

58.Samy Mahdy: And those who emigrated in Allah’s pathway, then got killed, or died, Allah will have livelihood them with finest livelihood. And surely Allah is the Best of the livelihood Providers.

59.Samy Mahdy: He will enter them at an entrance that satisfies them. And surely Allah is Knowledgeable, A Clement.

60.Samy Mahdy: That, and who punished with similarity to what he was punished by, then it was transgressed over him, Allah will victory him. Surely Allah is Pardoning, Forgiver.

61.Samy Mahdy: That is because Allah logs the night into the day, and He logs the day into the night, and surely Allah is Hearer, Seer.

62.Samy Mahdy: That is because Allah is Al-Haq (The Right), and what they are calling without Him is the invalid, and because Allah is Al- Aly (The Highest), Al-Kabeer (The Grand).

63.Samy Mahdy: Have you not seen that Allah sends down the water from the sky, so the earth becomes greenish? Surely Allah is Subtle, Expert.

64.Samy Mahdy: For Him whatever is in the skies and whatever is in the earth. And surely Allah is Al-Ghany (The Rich), Al-Hameed (The Praiseworthy).

65.Samy Mahdy: Have you not seen that Allah subserviated to you what is in the earth? And the arks run in the sea by His command? And He withholds up the sky lest it falls upon the earth, except by His permission? Surely Allah is with the people, is Kind, Merciful.

66.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who gives you, life then causes you to die, then revives you. Surely, the human was ungrateful.

67.Samy Mahdy: For every community We set up a rite, which they will ritualize. So do not let them dispute with you in the matter. And invite to your Lord; surely you are upon a straight guidance.

68.Samy Mahdy: And if they argue with you, say, “Allah is knower with what you are working.”

69.Samy Mahdy: Allah judges between you on The Resurrection Day within what you were differing within it.

70.Samy Mahdy: Have you not known that Allah knows what is in the skies and the earth? Surely that is in a book. Surely that upon Allah is easy.

71.Samy Mahdy: And they worshiped, without Allah, which He has not sent down with it a Sultan, and what they have no knowledge with it. And there is none for the oppressors from supporters.

72.Samy Mahdy: And when Our Proof Verses are recited upon them, you will recognize in the faces of those who disbelieved the denial. They are almost assaulted with those who recite upon them Our Verses. Say, “Shall I inform you with eviler than that? The Fire! Allah has promised it to those who disbelieved, and wretched is the destiny!”

73.Samy Mahdy: O the people! An example was cited, so listen for it: Surely those you call without Allah will never create a fly, even if they gathered together for it. And if the fly steals anything from them, they cannot rescue it from it. Weak are the seeker and the sought.

74.Samy Mahdy: They did not value Allah as His right value. Surely Allah is Strong, Almighty.

75.Samy Mahdy: Allah chooses from the angels, messengers and from the people. Surely Allah is Hearer, Seer.

76.Samy Mahdy: He knows what is between their hands, and what is behind them. And to Allah all the matters are returning.

77.Samy Mahdy: O you who believed! Kneel, and prostrate and worship your Lord, and do the goodness, perhaps you may be gaining. ۩

78.Samy Mahdy: And be efforted in Allah, His right effort. He has elected you and has not set up upon you in the religion from, a critical, your father Abraham’s creed. He named you Muslims before, and in this the Messenger will be a witness against you, and you will be witnesses against the people. So, establish the prayers, and give the Zakat, and hold firmly with Allah. He is your Guardian. So, a Gracious is Al-Mawla (The Guardian), and a Gracious is Al-Naseer (The Victory Giver).

1.Samy Mahdy: Already the believers had gained.

2.Samy Mahdy: Those who are in their prayers aweing.

3.Samy Mahdy: And those who from the chitchat are averted.

4.Samy Mahdy: And those who are for the Zakat, doers.

5.Samy Mahdy: And those who are for their genitalia, conservers.

6.Samy Mahdy: Except upon their spouses, or what their right hands owned, so they are not being blamed.

7.Samy Mahdy: So, whoever seeks beyond that, so those are the transgressors.

8.Samy Mahdy: And those who are caretakers for their trusts and covenants.

9.Samy Mahdy: And those who are keeping on their prayers.

10.Samy Mahdy: Those are the inheritors.

11.Samy Mahdy: Who are inheriting Al-Ferdous (Paradise), they are therein immortals.

12.Samy Mahdy: And We already created the human from an extraction of clay.

13.Samy Mahdy: Then We set him up as a sperm-drop, in a well settled place.

14.Samy Mahdy: Then We created the sperm-drop as a clinging clot. So, We created the clinging clot as an embryonic lump. So, We created the embryonic lump as bones. So, We clothed the bones with flesh. Then We instituted it as another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of the creators.

15.Samy Mahdy: Then, after that, you are dying.

16.Samy Mahdy: Then, on The Resurrection Day, you will be raised up.

17.Samy Mahdy: And We already created above you seven layered modalities, and We were not about the creation inattentive.

18.Samy Mahdy: And We sent down water from the sky with quantity, so We resided it in the earth, and surely, We were able to let it go.

19.Samy Mahdy: So, with it We instituted for you paradises among palms and vines, for you within them many fruits, and from it you are eating.

20.Samy Mahdy: And a tree exiting out from Sinai Tur (Mount), It sprouts with lipid and a tincture for those who eat.

21.Samy Mahdy: And surely for you in the livestock is an admonition lesson: We watered you from what is within their bellies, and for you many benefits in them, and among them you are eating.

22.Samy Mahdy: And upon them, and upon the arks, you are carried.

23.Samy Mahdy: And We already sent Noah to his kinfolk. So, he said, “O kinfolk, worship Allah, you have no God other than Him. So, will you not show piety?”

24.Samy Mahdy: So, the chieftains among his kinfolk, who disbelieved, said, “This is none except a humankind like you, who wants to have bounty over you. And if Allah willed, He would send down angels. We never heard this from our former parents.

25.Samy Mahdy: He is nothing but a man with madness. So, lurk in waiting for him for a while.”

26.Samy Mahdy: He said, “My Lord, victory me, with what they have falsified me.”

27.Samy Mahdy: So We revealed to him: “Make the Ark with Our eyes and our revelation. So, when our command comes, and the oven overflows, so, insert into it from every pair two, and your family, except those among them which the saying has proceeded against them. And do not speak to me in those who are oppressing; surely, they are drowned.”

28.Samy Mahdy: So, when you and those with you are settled in the Ark, so say, “The Praise for Allah, who has saved us from the oppressor kinfolk.”

29.Samy Mahdy: And say, “My Lord, descend me with a blessed descending, and you are the best of harborers.”

30.Samy Mahdy: Surely, in that are verses. And surely, We are trialing (Our slaves).

31.Samy Mahdy: Then, after them, We instituted another generation.

32.Samy Mahdy: So, We sent within them a messenger among themselves: “That you worship Allah. You have no God other than Him. So, will you not be showing piety?”

33.Samy Mahdy: And the chieftains of his kinfolk, those who disbelieved and falsified with the meeting of the Hereafter, and We had luxury them in the Dunya life, said, “This is none except a humankind like you; is eating from what you are eating, and he is drinking from what you are drinking.

34.Samy Mahdy: And if you obey a humankind like you, you would then be losers.

35.Samy Mahdy: Does he promise you that when you have died and become dust and bones, that you will be brought forth?

36.Samy Mahdy: Farfetched, farfetched is what you have been promised.

37.Samy Mahdy: Surely it is not except our Dunya life. We die, and we live, and we shall not be raising.

38.Samy Mahdy: Surely, he is not except a man, slandering upon Allah a lie. And we are not believers in him.”

39.Samy Mahdy: He said, “My Lord, victory me, with what they have falsified me.”

40.Samy Mahdy: He said, “In a little while they will become regretful.”

41.Samy Mahdy: So, The Scream took them, with the right, so We set them up as scum. So away for the oppressor kinfolk.

42.Samy Mahdy: Then, after them, We instituted another generation.

43.Samy Mahdy: No community precedes its term, nor do they delay it.

44.Samy Mahdy: Then We sent Our messengers successively. Whenever each community came to it, its messenger they falsified him. So, We follow some of them, some others, and We set them up as narrations. So, away with kinfolk who do not believe.

45.Samy Mahdy: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron, with Our verses and an obvious sultan.

46.Samy Mahdy: To Pharaoh and his chieftains, so they arrogate. And they were haughty kinfolk.

47.Samy Mahdy: So, they said, “Should we believe in two humankinds like us, and their kinfolk are worshipers for us?”

48.Samy Mahdy: So they falsified them, so they were among the destroyed ones.

49.Samy Mahdy: And We already gave Moses the Book, perhaps they may be guided.

50.Samy Mahdy: And We set up Mary’s son and his mother a verse, and We sheltered them to a hillock, possessor of a settlement place and flowing springs.

51.Samy Mahdy: O the messengers, eat from the good things, and work righteous. I am with what you are working, Knowledgeable.

52.Samy Mahdy: And surely this is your community, a one community, and I am your Lord, so show the piety of Me.

53.Samy Mahdy: So, they cut their matter between themselves into blocks; each party is rejoicing with what they have.

54.Samy Mahdy: So forsake them in their overwhelming, until a while.

55.Samy Mahdy: Do they consider that We are extending them by it, of money and sons?

56.Samy Mahdy: That We are hastening for them in goodness? Nay, but they do not feel.

57.Samy Mahdy: Surely those who, from their Lord’s awe, apprehended.

58.Samy Mahdy: And those who with their Lord’s Verses are believing.

59.Samy Mahdy: And those who, with their Lord not associating.

60.Samy Mahdy: And those who give what they were given, while their cores felt fear, surely, they are to their Lord will be returning.

61.Samy Mahdy: Those are hastening in goodness. And they for it outstrippers.

62.Samy Mahdy: And We do not charge a soul except its capacity. And with Us is a Book that speaks with the right, and they will not be oppressed.

63.Samy Mahdy: Nay, but their cores are in an immerse from this; and they have without that, works which they are working for it.

64.Samy Mahdy: Until, when We take their luxurious ones with the torment, behold, they will be groaning.

65.Samy Mahdy: Do not groan Today. Surely from Us you will never get victory.

66.Samy Mahdy: My Verses were already recited upon you, so you were turning back upon your heels.

67.Samy Mahdy: You are arrogating with it, talking by night obscenely.

68.Samy Mahdy: So, have they not pondered the saying? Or has come to them what has not come to their former parents?

69.Samy Mahdy: Or is it that they did not recognize their messenger, so they are denying him?

70.Samy Mahdy: Or do they say, "Within him is madness?" Nay, but he brought them by the right, and most of them for the right, haters.

71.Samy Mahdy: And if the right followed their desires, it would have spoiled the skies, the earth, and whoever is in them. Nay, but We have brought them with their reminder, so they are from their reminder, averting.

72.Samy Mahdy: Or you ask them for a tribute? So, your Lord’s tribute is goodness, and He is the best of the livelihood providers.

73.Samy Mahdy: And surely you are calling them to a straight path.

74.Samy Mahdy: And surely those who are not believing in the Hereafter are swerving about the path.

75.Samy Mahdy: And if We mercied them, and uncovered what is with them among the harm, they would persist in their tyranny, confusing blindly.

76.Samy Mahdy: And We have already taken them with the torment, so they did not succumb to their Lord, nor did they humbly supplicate.

77.Samy Mahdy: Until, when We opened upon them a door, possessor of severe torment, behold! they are bewildered within it.

78.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who instituted for you the hearing, and the sights, and the hearts. A little is what you are thanking.

79.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who produced you on the earth, and to Him you are mustering.

80.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who gives life and causes death, and for Him is the variation of night and the day. So, will you not be reasoning?

81.Samy Mahdy: Nay, but they said like, of what the formers said.

82.Samy Mahdy: They said, “When we die, and we are dust and bones, will we be raised up?

83.Samy Mahdy: We have already promised this before, we and our parents, surely this is none except, the formers’ legends.”

84.Samy Mahdy: Say, “For whom the earth, and whoever is in it, if you are knowing?”

85.Samy Mahdy: They will say, “To Allah.” Say, “So, Will yourselves not be remembering?

86.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Who is the seven skies Lord, and The Great Throne’s Lord?”

87.Samy Mahdy: They will say, “Allah.” Say, “So, will you not be showing piety?”

88.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Who is by his hand is everything's kingdom, and He shields and cannot be shield against Him, if you were knowing?”

89.Samy Mahdy: They will say, “Allah.” Say, “Then how are you, be bewitched?”

90.Samy Mahdy: Nay, but We have brought them with the right, and they are surely liars.

91.Samy Mahdy: Allah has not taken among a son, and there was not with Him among a god. For then, each God would have gone with what he has created and would some of them be higher over some others. Glorified is Allah, about what they are describing.

92.Samy Mahdy: The unseen’s Knower and the witnessing. So high exalted is He above what they are associating.

93.Samy Mahdy: Say, “My Lord, if you would show me what they are promised.

94.Samy Mahdy: My Lord, so do not set me up within the oppressor kinfolk.”

95.Samy Mahdy: And surely, We are able upon showing you what We promise them.

96.Samy Mahdy: Push by which is the best the badness. We are more knowledgeable by what they are describing.

97.Samy Mahdy: And say, “My Lord, I am incanting with you from the devils' prods.

98.Samy Mahdy: And I am incanting with you, my Lord, lest they be presenting with me.”

99.Samy Mahdy: Until, when death comes to one of them, he said, “My Lord, return me back.

100.Samy Mahdy: Perhaps I may be working righteous, within what I have quit. '' No! It is a word he is saying, and from behind them is a barrier, till the Day they are raised.

101.Samy Mahdy: So, when it is blown in The Horn, So there are no pedigrees between them on that Day, nor they questioned (Each other).

102.Samy Mahdy: So, whoever his scales heavied, so those are the gainers.

103.Samy Mahdy: And whoever his scales lightened, so those who have lost themselves; in Gohanam (Hell), are immortals.

104.Samy Mahdy: The Fire singes their faces, and they are therein, griming.

105.Samy Mahdy: “Were not My verses recited upon you, so you were falsifying it?”

106.Samy Mahdy: They said, “Our Lord, our unhappiness overcame us and we were an astray kinfolk.

107.Samy Mahdy: Our Lord! bring us out of it. And if we ever return, we surely are oppressors.”

108.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Be despised therein, and do not speak to Me.

109.Samy Mahdy: Surely there is a team among My slaves, who are saying, `Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us, and mercy us; And You are the Best of the merciful ones.'

110.Samy Mahdy: So, you took them mockery, until they made you forget My reminder; and you were from them, laughing.

111.Samy Mahdy: Surely Today, I recompensed them with what they have been patient with. Surely, they are the winners.”

112.Samy Mahdy: He said, “How many lunar years (counted) have you tarried on the earth?”

113.Samy Mahdy: They said, “We tarried a day, or part of a day; so, ask the counting ones.”

114.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Surely you were not tarried except a little, if you were knowing.

115.Samy Mahdy: So would you only consider that We created you vainly, and that you will not return to Us?”

116.Samy Mahdy: So Exalted is Allah, Al-Malik (The King), Al-Haq (The Right). There is no God except Him, The Noble Throne’s Lord.

117.Samy Mahdy: And whoever calls with Allah another God, he has no evidence with it, so his reckoning is at his Lord. Surely the infidels will not be gaining.

118.Samy Mahdy: And say, “My Lord, forgive and mercy, and you are the Best of the merciful ones.

1.Samy Mahdy: A Surah, We sent it down and imposed it, and We sent down within it proof verses, perhaps you may be remembering.

2.Samy Mahdy: The adulteress and the adulterer, so lash each one of them a hundred lashes, and do not take you with them a pity in Allah’s Religion, if you are believing with Allah and the Last Day. And let a category among the believers witness their torment.

3.Samy Mahdy: The adulterer does not shag except an adulteress or an idolatress; and the adulteress does not shag except an adulterer or an idolater. And forbidden that upon the believers.

4.Samy Mahdy: And those who accuse the fortified women, then they are not bringing with, four witnesses, so lash them with eighty lashes, and do not ever accept from them witnessing. And those are the debauchees.

5.Samy Mahdy: Except for those who were repenting after that, and repairing; so, surely Allah is Forgiver, Merciful.

6.Samy Mahdy: As for those who accuse their spouses, and have no witnesses except themselves, so a witnessing of one of them by Allah is equivalent to four witnessings that he is among the truthful ones.

7.Samy Mahdy: And the fifth time, that Allah’s curse be upon him, if he is among the liars.

8.Samy Mahdy: And will ward off her torment, that she witnesses four witnessings, by Allah, that he is among the liars.

9.Samy Mahdy: And the fifth time, that Allah’s wrath be upon her, if he is among the truthful ones.

10.Samy Mahdy: And if not for Allah’s bounty be upon you, and His mercy, and surely Allah is Repented, Wise.

11.Samy Mahdy: Surely those who brought with the fake are a gang from you. Do not consider it bad for you nay, but it is goodness for you. For each person from them, what he earns from the sin. And the one who took over its bigness from them, for him is a great torment.

12.Samy Mahdy: Why, not when you heard it, the believing men and the believing women assumed a goodness with themselves, and said, “This is an obvious fake”?

13.Samy Mahdy: Why did they not bring four witnesses upon it? If they did not bring the witnesses, so those are with Allah, the liars.

14.Samy Mahdy: And if not, Allah’s bounty be upon you, and His mercy, in the Dunya (this world) and the Hereafter, you would have been touched within what you were discoursing into it, a great torment.

15.Samy Mahdy: When you throw it with your tongues and say with your mouths what you had no knowledge with, and you consider it easy; and it is with Allah, a great.

16.Samy Mahdy: And why not, when you heard it, you should have said, “It is not for us to speak with this. Glorified are You (Our Lord), this is a great false accusation.”

17.Samy Mahdy: Allah exhorts you, that you should not return to the like of it ever, if you are believers.

18.Samy Mahdy: And Allah demonstrates the Verses for you. And Allah is Knowledgeable, Wise.

19.Samy Mahdy: Surely those who love that the obscenity spreads within those who believed, for them is a painful torment, in the Dunya (this life) and the Hereafter. And Allah knows, and you are not knowing.

20.Samy Mahdy: And were it not, Allah’s bounty be upon you, and His mercy, and surely Allah is A Clement, Merciful.

21.Samy Mahdy: O you who believed! Do not follow Satan’s footsteps. And whoever follows Satan’s footsteps, so he commands by obscenity and denial. And if not, Allah’s bounty be upon you, and His mercy, no one among you would have been refined, ever. But Allah refines whomever He wills. And Allah is Hearer, Knowledgeable.

22.Samy Mahdy: And the possessors of the bounty and the amplitude from you should not be deficient to give the possessors of consanguinity, and the needy persons, and the emigrants in Allah’s pathway. And let them pardon and let them condone. Do you not love that Allah forgives you? And Allah is Forgiver, Merciful.

23.Samy Mahdy: Surely those who accuse the fortified women, the inattentive, the believing women are cursed in the Dunya (this life) and the Hereafter. And for them a great torment.

24.Samy Mahdy: On a Day when their tongues, and their hands, and their feet will witness against them, with what they were working.

25.Samy Mahdy: On that Day, Allah fulfills their religion (Debt), the right, and they will be knowing that Allah is Al-Haq (The Right) Al-Mubeen (The Manifest).

26.Samy Mahdy: The malicious women (words) are for the malicious men, and the malicious men (words) are for the malicious women, and the good women (words) are for the good men, and the good men (words) are for the good women. Those are innocent from what they are saying. For them is forgiveness, and a noble livelihood.

27.Samy Mahdy: O you who believed! Do not enter homes other than your homes, until you become accustomed and greet their inhabitants. That is goodness for you, perhaps you may be remembering.

28.Samy Mahdy: So, if you find no one in them. So, do not enter them until you are given permission. And if it is said for you, “Go back,” then go back. That is more refined for you. And Allah is by what you are working, Knowledgeable.

29.Samy Mahdy: There is no misdemeanor upon you for entering uninhabited houses, in which there are belongings of yours. And Allah knows what you are appearing and what you are muting.

30.Samy Mahdy: Say for the believing men to reduce their sights, and to conserve their genitalia. That is more refined for them. Surely Allah is an expert with what they are making.

31.Samy Mahdy: And say for the believing women to reduce their sights, and to conserve their genitalia, and not appear their adornment except that which exposes thereof and to draw their head-covers over their bosoms pocket and not appear their adornment except for their husbands, or their fathers, or their husbands' fathers, or their sons, or their husbands' sons, or their brothers, or their brothers' sons, or their sisters' sons, or their women, or those which their right hands possess, or those male attendants having no vigor desire, or children who are not yet appear on private aspects of the women. And let them not strike their feet to make known what they are hiding among their adornment. And repent to Allah, altogether, O believers, perhaps you might be gaining.

32.Samy Mahdy: And request to shag the unmarried among you and the righteous among your male slaves and female slaves. If they are poor, Allah will enrich them from His bounty, and Allah is all-Encompassing, Knowledgeable.

33.Samy Mahdy: And let those who do not find shagging be chaste, until Allah enriches them from His bounty. And those who seek writing the book from whom your right hands possess – so write a book for them, if you know there is within them a goodness, and give them from Allah’s money which He has given you. And do not force your girls on the prostitution, if they want fortification, you will be seeking the belongings of the Dunya life, and whoever is forcing them, so Allah after their compulsion is Forgiver, Merciful.

34.Samy Mahdy: And We have already sent down to you proof verses, and examples from those who passed away before you, and an admonition for the pious.

35.Samy Mahdy: Allah is the skies’ Light and the earth. An example of His light is like a niche within which is a lamp, the lamp is within glass, the glass as if it was a pearly planet, fueled from a blessed tree, an olive tree, not eastern, nor western. Its oil would almost illuminate, even if no fire has touched it. Light upon Light. Allah guides for His light whoever He wills. And Allah thus cites the examples for the people. And Allah is with everything, Knowledgeable.

36.Samy Mahdy: In houses which Allah has permitted that to be raised and mentioned His name within them. Glorifying him therein, in the morning and the evening.

37.Samy Mahdy: Men neither the trade nor the sell amuse them about Allah’s mention, and establish the prayers, and give the Zakat. They are fearing a Day on it the cores and sights are overturning.

38.Samy Mahdy: Allah will recompense them the best of what they worked and increase them among His bounty. And Allah provides livelihood to whoever He wills without reckoning.

39.Samy Mahdy: And those who disbelieved, their works are like a mirage in a lowland. The thirsty considers it water. Until, when he comes to it, he does not find it a thing, and he finds Allah with him, so He fulfilled his reckoning. And Allah is swift in reckoning.

40.Samy Mahdy: Or like darkness in a deep sea, over-covers it waves, from above it is waves, above which are clouds. Darkness some of them are above some others. If he exits his hand, he will hardly see it. And whoever Allah has not set up a light for him, so there is no light for him.

41.Samy Mahdy: Have you not seen that Allah glorifies for Him whoever is in the skies and the earth, and the birds spread their wings? Each already knows its prayer, and its glorifying. And Allah is Knowledgeable with what they are doing.

42.Samy Mahdy: And for Allah is the skies kingdom and the earth, and to Allah is the destiny.

43.Samy Mahdy: Have you not seen that Allah propels clouds, then He concords between it, then He makes it cumulus, so you see the heavy rain exit from through it. And He sends down from the sky, among mountains [of clouds] within which is hail, so He inflicts with it whom He wills and averts it about whom He wills. The flash of its lightning almost takes away the sight.

44.Samy Mahdy: Allah overturns the night and the day. Surely in that, is an admonition for the possessors of the sights.

45.Samy Mahdy: And Allah created every moving creature from water. So, among them who walks on his belly, and among them who walks on two feet, and among them who walks on four. Allah creates whatever He wills. Surely Allah is over everything competent.

46.Samy Mahdy: We already sent down declaring verses, and Allah guides whomever He wills to a straight path.

47.Samy Mahdy: And they are saying, “We have believed with Allah and with the Messenger, and we obeyed,” then a team among them turns away after that. And those are not the believers.

48.Samy Mahdy: And if they are called to Allah and His Messenger, to judge between them, lo! a team from them are averting.

49.Samy Mahdy: And if the right is for them, they come to him yielding in obedience.

50.Samy Mahdy: Is there a disease in their cores? Or are they doubted? Or do they fear that Allah and His Messenger misjudge upon them? Nay, but those are the oppressors.

51.Samy Mahdy: It is only the believers’ saying, if they called to Allah and His Messenger to judge between them, that they say, “We hear and we obey.” And those are the gainers.

52.Samy Mahdy: And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger, and awes of Allah, and shows piety of Him, so those are the winners.

53.Samy Mahdy: And they swore by Allah with their most effort oaths, that if you commanded them, they would exit. Say, “Do not swear. Obedience is well-known. Surely Allah is with what you are working, Expert.”

54.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Obey Allah and obey the Messenger.” So, if they turned away, so upon him what he was loaded, and upon you what you were loaded. And if you obey him, you will be guided. And nothing is upon the Messenger except the obvious notification.

55.Samy Mahdy: Allah has promised those among you who believed and worked the righteous deeds, that He will make them successors on earth, as He made those before them successors, and He will enable for them their religion, which He has satisfied for them, and He will substitute after their fearing, a security. They worship Me, not associating with Me of a thing. And whoever disbelieved after that, so those are the debauchees.

56.Samy Mahdy: And establish the prayers, and give the Zakat, and obey the Messenger, perhaps you may be mercified.

57.Samy Mahdy: Do not consider those who disbelieved cause incapacitation on the earth. Their shelter is The Fire; and wretched is the destiny.

58.Samy Mahdy: O you who have believed, let those whom your right hands possess and those who have not reached puberty among you ask permission from you at three times: before the dawn prayer and when you put aside your clothing at noon and after the night prayer. Three times of privacy aspects to you. There is no misdemeanor upon you nor upon them after that. They are circumambulating on you, some of you on some others. Thus, Allah demonstrates the verses for you. And Allah is Knowledgeable, Wise.

59.Samy Mahdy: And if the children among you reach puberty so they must ask permission, as those before them asked permission. Thus, Allah demonstrates the verses for you. And Allah is Knowledgeable, Wise.

60.Samy Mahdy: And the retired among the women, who have no expectation for a request to shag, so there is no misdemeanor upon them in putting off their clothing, not displaying with adornments. And if they are being chaste, it is good for them. And Allah is Hearer, Knowledgeable.

61.Samy Mahdy: There is no critical upon the blind, nor critical upon the lame, nor critical upon the diseased, nor upon yourselves for eating from your homes, or your fathers’ homes, or your mothers’ homes, or your brothers’ homes, or your sisters’ homes, or the homes of your paternal uncles, or the homes of your paternal aunts, or the homes of your maternal uncles, or the homes of your maternal aunts, or those whose keys you own, or the homes of your friends. No misdemeanor by eating together or separately. So, if you enter homes, So, greet yourselves with a greeting from Allah, blessed and good. Allah thus demonstrates the verses for you, perhaps you may be reasoning.

62.Samy Mahdy: The believers were only those who believed in Allah and His Messenger, and if they are with him for a gathering matter, they do not go until they have asked him for permission. Surely those who ask your permission are those who believe in Allah and His Messenger. So, if they ask your permission for some business of theirs, so permit for whom you willed among them, and ask Allah’s forgiveness for them. Surely Allah is Forgiver, Merciful.

63.Samy Mahdy: Do not make the call of Messenger between you as call some of you to some others. Already Allah knows those among you who slip away hiding themselves. So, be cautious, those who dissent from his command, lest that an infatuation inflicts them, or a painful torment inflicts them.

64.Samy Mahdy: Verily, that for Allah whatever is in the skies and the earth. Already He knows what you are upon it. And on a Day, when they are returned to Him, He will inform them with what they worked. And Allah is with everything Knowledgeable.

1.Samy Mahdy: Blessed is the one who sent down the Criterion upon His slave, to be a warner for the worlds.

2.Samy Mahdy: The one who for Him is the skies Sovereignty and the earth, and who has not taken a son and was not for Him an associate in the Sovereignty and He created everything; so, He predestined it an exact estimation.

3.Samy Mahdy: And they took without Him gods, not created a thing, while they were created; and they are not owning harm or benefit for themselves; nor owning death, or life or propagation (Raising the dead).

4.Samy Mahdy: And those who disbelieved said, “Surely this is nothing except a fake that he slandered it, and other kinfolk have aided him upon it.” So, they have already brought oppression and perjury.

5.Samy Mahdy: And they said, “The former’s Legends; he wrote them down; so, they were dictated to him in morning and evening.”

6.Samy Mahdy: Say, “It was sent down by the one who knows the Secret in the skies and the earth. Surely, He is ever Forgiver, Merciful.”

7.Samy Mahdy: And they said, “What is this messenger, who eats food, and walks in the marketplaces? If only an angel was sent down to him, so be with him a warner.”

8.Samy Mahdy: Or, “If only a treasure was thrown to him.” Or “If only for him a paradise, from which he eats.” And the oppressors said, “Surely you follow none except a man bewitched.”

9.Samy Mahdy: Observe how they cited the examples for you. So, they strayed, so they could not find a pathway.

10.Samy Mahdy: Blessed is the one who, if He willed, set up for you a goodness than that, paradise beneath which the rivers are running, and He set up palaces for you.

11.Samy Mahdy: Nay, but they falsified with the Hour, and We prepared for whom falsified with the Hour a Blaze fire.

12.Samy Mahdy: If it sees them from a far place, they will hear it enraging and roaring.

13.Samy Mahdy: And when they are thrown among it, into a narrow place, bound, they will call therein, perditions.

14.Samy Mahdy: “Do not call for one perdition Today but call for many perditions.

15.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Is that goodness, or the Eternity Paradise which promised by it the pious? It was for them a reward and a destiny

16.Samy Mahdy: They will have therein whatever they wish, immortals. It is upon your Lord a responsible promise.

17.Samy Mahdy: And on a Day when He musters them, and what they are worshiping without Allah, So, He will say, “Were you who strayed My slaves these, or were they who strayed the pathway?”

18.Samy Mahdy: They said, “Glorified are You. It should not be for us to take without You among guardians. But you let them enjoy themselves, and their parents, until they forgot the Reminder, and they were a kinfolk who ruined.”

19.Samy Mahdy: So, already they falsified you with what you say; so, you are not able to avert nor victory. And whoever from you oppresses We will let him taste a grand torment.

20.Samy Mahdy: And We did not send before you, among the messengers except that they were eating the food and walking in the markets. And We set up some of you for some others, an infatuation - will you be patient? And your Lord is ever, Seer.

21.Samy Mahdy: And those who are not expecting Our meeting, said, “Why were not the angels sent down upon us, or we could see our Lord.” They are already arrogating in themselves, and they are insolent, a great insolent.

22.Samy Mahdy: On a Day when they see the angels, no preach (good tidings) for the criminals on that Day; and they say, “A banned ban.”

23.Samy Mahdy: And We presented toward what they worked among a work, So We set it up into scattered floating dust.

24.Samy Mahdy: The Paradise’s companions on that Day are the best settlement place, and best noonday resting place.

25.Samy Mahdy: And on a Day when the sky is splitting with the Overcast, and the angels descended a descent.

26.Samy Mahdy: On that Day, The Sovereignty, The Right, for Al-Rahman (The Widely merciful), and it is upon the infidels a difficult Day.

27.Samy Mahdy: And on a Day, when the oppressor bites upon his hands, say, “Oh, I wish I had taken with the Messenger a pathway.

28.Samy Mahdy: Oh, woe to me! I wish I had not taken that person as an intimate friend.

29.Samy Mahdy: He already let me stray from the reminder after it had come to me; and Satan was ever for the human, a deserter.”

30.Samy Mahdy: And the Messenger said, “O My Lord, surely my kinfolk has taken this - the Quran - as abandoned.”

31.Samy Mahdy: And thus, for every prophet We set up enemies among the criminals. And sufficient is your Lord as a guide and a Victory Giver.

32.Samy Mahdy: And those who disbelieved said, “Why was the Quran not sent down upon him all at once?” Thus, to stabilize with it your heart, and We recited it, a recitation.

33.Samy Mahdy: And they do not come to you with an example except that We bring to you with the right and a best explanation.

34.Samy Mahdy: Those who are mustering to Gohanam (Hell) upon their faces, those are eviler, position, and further astray pathway.

35.Samy Mahdy: And We already gave Moses the Book, and We set up his brother Aaron with him as minister.

36.Samy Mahdy: So, We said, “Go to the kinfolk who are falsified with Our verses,” so We devastated them, a devastation.

37.Samy Mahdy: And Noah’s kinfolk: when they falsified the messengers, We drowned them, and set them up as a verse for the people. And We have prepared for the oppressors a painful torment.

38.Samy Mahdy: And Aad, and Thamud, and the inhabitants of Ar-Ras, and many generations in between that.

39.Samy Mahdy: And for each We cited the examples for him; and each We smashed, a smashing.

40.Samy Mahdy: And already they came upon the city that it rained the bad rain. So, had they not seen it? Nay, but they are not expecting a Propagation (Raising the dead).

41.Samy Mahdy: And when they see you, surely, they are not taking you except as a mockery: “Is this the one whom Allah missioned a messenger?”

42.Samy Mahdy: “He almost strays us about our Gods, had we not been patient with them.” And they will know, when they see the torment, who is further astray’ pathway.

43.Samy Mahdy: Have you seen him who took his desire as his God? So, are you a trustee over him?

44.Samy Mahdy: Or do you consider that most of them are hearing or reasoning? Surely, they are not except as livestock. Nay, but they are more straying a pathway.

45.Samy Mahdy: Are you not seen to your Lord how He extends the shadow? And if He willed; He makes it stillness. Then We make the sun, evidence upon it.

46.Samy Mahdy: Then We grasped it towards Us, an easy grasping.

47.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who set up the night as apparel for you, and the sleep as Repose; and He set up the day, a propagation.

48.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who sends the winds, preaching (Good tidings) between His merciful hands; and We send down from the sky a purifying water.

49.Samy Mahdy: To give life with it to a dead town, and water it to whatever We have created from livestock and many people.

50.Samy Mahdy: And We have already distributed it between them, to let them be remembered, so most of the people refuse, except an infidelity.

51.Samy Mahdy: And if We willed, We would have missioned in every village warner.

52.Samy Mahdy: So, do not obey the infidels, and effort against them with it, a grand effort.

53.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who merged the two seas; this one palatable, sweet, and that one is salty, bitter; and He set up between them a barrier, and a banned ban.

54.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who created from the water, humankind. So, He set him a lineage and In-laws. And ever is your Lord competent.

55.Samy Mahdy: And they are worshiping without Allah what neither benefits them nor harms them. And the infidel was ever against his Lord, a backer.

56.Samy Mahdy: And We have not sent you, except as a preacher and a warner.

57.Samy Mahdy: Say, “I do not ask you to wage upon it, except only whoever wishes to take to his Lord a pathway.”

58.Samy Mahdy: And rely upon Al-Hayy (The Living), the One who never dies; and glorified by His praise. And sufficient is He with His slaves’ misdeeds, an Expert.

59.Samy Mahdy: The One who created the skies and the earth and whatever is between them in six days, then He settled upon the Throne. Al-Rahman (The Widely merciful). So, ask about Him, an expert.

60.Samy Mahdy: And when it is said to them, “Prostrate for Al-Rahman (The Widely merciful),” they said, “And what is Al-Rahman? Will we prostrate for whatever you command us?” And it increased them, an aversion. ۩

61.Samy Mahdy: Blessed is the one who set constellations in the sky, and set up in it a lamp, and a moon enlighten.

62.Samy Mahdy: And He is the one who made the night and the day, succession for whoever wants to remember or wants to thank.

63.Samy Mahdy: And Al-Rahman’s slaves are those who walk on the earth modestly, and when the ignorant ones talk to them, they say, “Peace.”

64.Samy Mahdy: And those who stay the night prostrating themselves to their Lord and standing up.

65.Samy Mahdy: And those who say, ‘‘Our Lord averted from us Gohanam’s torment, surely its torment was inseparable.

66.Samy Mahdy: Surely, it is a wretched settlement place and residence.”

67.Samy Mahdy: And those who, when they spend, are neither extravagant nor stingy, and they were between that, a moderately upright.

68.Samy Mahdy: And those who do not call with Allah any other God, and do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except with the right, and do not commit adultery. And whoever does that will meet the sins’ penalties.

69.Samy Mahdy: The torment doubled for him on The Resurrection Day, and be immortal therein, humiliated.

70.Samy Mahdy: Except whoever repented, and believed, and worked righteous. So those Allah will replace their bad deeds with excellences. And Allah is ever Forgiver, Merciful.

71.Samy Mahdy: And whoever repented and worked righteous, so he repents surely towards Allah a repentance.

72.Samy Mahdy: And those who do not witness the Perjury; and when they passed with the chatter, they passed as nobles.

73.Samy Mahdy: And those if reminded with their Lord’s verses, they do not fall on them deaf and blind.

74.Samy Mahdy: And those who say, “Our Lord, endowed us from our spouses and our offspring, eyes’ coolness and set us up for the pious, Imams (Leaders).”

75.Samy Mahdy: Those recompensed the Chamber with what they have been patience and received therein a greeting and peace.

76.Samy Mahdy: They were immortal therein; it was an excellent settlement place and residence.

77.Samy Mahdy: Say, “My Lord does not care of you, was it not your calling? So, you already falsified it, so it will be obligatory.”

1.Samy Mahdy: Ta, Seen, Meem.

2.Samy Mahdy: These are The Verses of The Obvious Book.

3.Samy Mahdy: Perhaps you put yourself to deadly grieve if not they are believers.

4.Samy Mahdy: If We willed, We could send down upon them a verse from the sky, so their necks should still be subjecting to it.

5.Samy Mahdy: And no reminder comes to them from Al-Rahman (The Widely merciful), except they are averting from it.

6.Samy Mahdy: So, they have already falsified it, so it will come to them the news of what they ridiculed with it.

7.Samy Mahdy: Have they not seen to the earth, how many from every noble pair We planted therein?

8.Samy Mahdy: Surely in that was a verse, and they most of them were not believers

9.Samy Mahdy: And surely, your Lord is Al-Aziz (The Almighty), Al-Raheem (The merciful to his creation and himself).

10.Samy Mahdy: And when Your Lord called out Moses, “come to the oppressor kinfolk”.

11.Samy Mahdy: Pharaoh’s kinfolk. Are they not showing piety?”

12.Samy Mahdy: He said, “My Lord, I fear that they will falsify me.

13.Samy Mahdy: And my chest narrows, and my tongue will not launch, so send to me Aaron.

14.Samy Mahdy: And they have a sin against me, so I fear they will kill me.”

15.Samy Mahdy: He said, “No. Go, both of you, with our verses. Surely, We are with you, listening.

16.Samy Mahdy: So, come to Pharaoh, so say, ‘We are The Worlds' Lord’ Messengers.

17.Samy Mahdy: That you send Israel's children with us. “

18.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Did we not raise you within us as a newborn, and you tarried within us from your age many lunar years?

19.Samy Mahdy: And you did your deed which you did, and you were among the infidels.”

20.Samy Mahdy: He said, “I did it then, while I was among the astray ones.

21.Samy Mahdy: So, I escaped from you when I feared you; so, my Lord endowed me, a judgment, and set me among the messengers.

82.Samy Mahdy: And when the saying has occurred upon them, We brought out for them from the earth a moving creature which will talk to them that the people were with Our verses not certain.

83.Samy Mahdy: And on a Day when We muster from every community a cohort from those who falsified with Our verses; so, they are driven in groups.

84.Samy Mahdy: Until, if they came, And He said, “Did you falsify with My verses and you did not encompass with them in knowledge? Or what you were working on?”

85.Samy Mahdy: And the saying occurred upon them with what they oppressed, so they are not speaking.

86.Samy Mahdy: Have they not seen that We set up the night for them to repose within it, and the day for giving sight? Surely in that are verses for a kinfolk who believe.

87.Samy Mahdy: And on a Day when it is blown in the Trumpet, so whoever is in the skies and the earth will be dismayed, except whomever Allah wills; and all will come degraded to Him.

88.Samy Mahdy: And you see the mountains, and consider them motionless, while they pass, as the clouds are passing, Allah’s made, the one who perfected everything. Surely, He is an expert with what you are doing.

89.Samy Mahdy: Whoever brings with the excelled deed, so for him better than it, and they, from the dismay of that Day, will be safe.

90.Samy Mahdy: And whoever brings with the bad deed, so their faces will be tossed into the Fire. Will you be penalized except for what you were working on?

91.Samy Mahdy: “I was commanded only to worship the town’s Lord this, the one who has sanctified it, and for Him is everything; and I was commanded to be among the submitting (Muslims).

92.Samy Mahdy: And recite the Quran.” So, whoever is guided, so only guided for himself. And whoever strayed, So, say, “I am only among the Warners.”

93.Samy Mahdy: And say, “The Praise for Allah; He will show you His verses, so you will recognize them. And Your Lord is not inattentive about what you are working.”

1.Samy Mahdy: Ta, Seen, Meem.

2.Samy Mahdy: These are the Verses of The Obvious Book.

3.Samy Mahdy: We recite upon you from Moses’s news and Pharaoh with the right, for a kinfolk who believe.

4.Samy Mahdy: Surely Pharaoh exalted himself on the earth, and set up its inhabitants into sects. He weakened a category from them, slaughters their sons, and lets their women live. Surely, he was from the spoilers.

5.Samy Mahdy: And We want to confer favors upon those who were weakened in the earth, and to set up them (Imams) leaders, and to set up them the inheritors.

6.Samy Mahdy: And to enable them in the earth; and to show Pharaoh, Hamaan, and their troops, from them what they were cautioning.

7.Samy Mahdy: And We revealed to Moses’s mother: “That you suckle him; so, if you fear upon him, so fling him into the Yam (deep water), and do not fear, nor grieve; We will return him to you, and set up him from the messengers.”

8.Samy Mahdy: So, Pharaoh’s folks picked him up, to be an enemy and a sorrow for them. Surely, Pharaoh, Hamaan, and their troops were guilt-doers.

9.Samy Mahdy: And Pharaoh’s woman said, “An eye's coolness for me and for you. Do not kill him; perhaps he will be of benefit to us, or we may take him as a son.” While they do not feel.

10.Samy Mahdy: And Moses' mother's heart became empty. She was about to disclose him if not We had fastened upon her core, to be among the believers.

11.Samy Mahdy: And she said to his sister, “Trace him.” So, she watched him from, aside while they did not feel.

12.Samy Mahdy: And We forbade upon him, the wet nurses before. So, she said, “shall I usher you upon a family house who sponsors him for you? and they are, for him, advisor rearers?”

13.Samy Mahdy: So, We returned him to his mother, in order to cool her eyes, and not grieve, and know that Allah’s promise is true. But most of them do not know.

14.Samy Mahdy: And when he reached his strength, and was ripe, We gave him wisdom and knowledge. Thus, do We recompense the benefactors.

15.Samy Mahdy: And he entered the city upon un-vigilance from its inhabitants. So, he found in it two men fighting, this among his own sect, and that among his enemies. So, the one among his sect solicited his rescue against the one among his enemies; so Moses nudged him, so he executed him. He said, “This is among Satan's work; surely he is an obvious strayer enemy.”

16.Samy Mahdy: He said, “My Lord, I have oppressed myself, so forgive me.” So, He forgave him. He is Al-Ghafoor (The Forgiver), Al-Raheem (The merciful to his creation and himself).

17.Samy Mahdy: He said, “My Lord, with what you have graced upon me, I will never be a backup for the criminals.”

18.Samy Mahdy: So, he became, in the city, fearful and vigilant, so then the one who had asked for his victory by Yesterday, was screaming out to him. Moses said to him, “You are an obvious luring one.”

19.Samy Mahdy: So, when he wanted to annihilate the one who was their enemy, he said, “O Moses, do you want to kill me, as you killed a soul yesterday? Surely you only want to be mighty on the earth, and do not want to be from the repairers.”

20.Samy Mahdy: And a man came from the farthest part of the city pursued. He said, “O Moses, the chieftains are plotting to kill you, so exit; I am for you from the advisors.”

21.Samy Mahdy: So he exited from it, fearful, vigilant. He said, “My Lord, save me from the oppressor kinfolk.”

22.Samy Mahdy: And when he faced toward Midian, he said, “Perhaps my Lord will guide me, the pathway’s soundness. ”

23.Samy Mahdy: And when he arrived at Midian's water, he found a community of the people who were watering, and he found without them two women were keeping back (their flocks). He said, “What is the matter with you?” They said, “We cannot draw water until the shepherds depart, and our father is a very old man (Sheikh).”

24.Samy Mahdy: So he watered them, then turned to the shade, so he said, “My Lord, I am for whatever goodness you send down to me, a poor.”

25.Samy Mahdy: So, one of them came to him, walking with shyness. She said, “My father is calling you, to recompense you a wage of what you watered for us.” So, when he came to him, and he storified, the stories to him, he said, “Do not fear, you have been saved from the oppressor kinfolk.”

26.Samy Mahdy: One of them said, “O Father, hire him; the best who you are hiring is the strong, the honest.”

27.Samy Mahdy: He said, “I want to request you to shag, one of these two daughters of mine, that you give a wage for the term of eight pilgrimage seasons (years of work). So, if you complete ten. So, it is yours. I do not want hardship upon you. You will find me, if Allah wills among the righteous.”

28.Samy Mahdy: He said, “That is between you and me. Whichever of the two terms I completed, so no aggression against me; and Allah is over what we say, a trustee.”

29.Samy Mahdy: So, when Moses had accomplished the term, and walked with his family, he familiarized, a fire from Al-Tur side (The Mount). He said for his family, “Bide here, I have familiarized a fire. Perhaps I will bring you news from it, or an ember from the fire, perhaps you may be warm up.”

30.Samy Mahdy: So, when he came to it, he was called from the right bank side of the valley, in the Blessed Spot, from the tree, that: “O Moses, surely, I am Allah, The Worlds' Lord.

31.Samy Mahdy: And throw down your staff.” So, when he saw it slithering, as if it was a Jinn (Snake), he turned away in back retreat, and not retraced. “O Moses, come forward, and do not fear, surely you are among the secured ones.

32.Samy Mahdy: And insert your hand in your bosom pocket, and it will come out white, without blemish, and adduct your wing to you, from the terrifying. So, these are two evidences from your Lord to Pharaoh and his chieftains. Surely, they are debauchees’ kinfolk.”

33.Samy Mahdy: He said, “My Lord, I have killed a soul among them, so I fear they will kill me.

34.Samy Mahdy: And my brother Aaron, he is more fluent in tongue than me, so send him with me, a supporter, to confirm me, I am afraid that they falsified me.”

35.Samy Mahdy: He said, “We will strengthen your arm with your brother, and We will set up a sultan for you, so they will not reach you with Our verses, you and whoever follow you are the predominant.”

36.Samy Mahdy: So, when Moses came to them with Our proof verses, they said, “This is nothing except slandered magic, and We did not hear this in our former parents.”

37.Samy Mahdy: And Moses said, “My Lord is knower with who brings with the guidance from Him, and who will be for him the home’s consequence. Surely the oppressors will not gain.”

38.Samy Mahdy: And Pharaoh said, “O the chieftains, I do not know a god for you other than me. So set fire on the clay for me, O Hamaan, so set up for me a palace, perhaps I may ascend to Moses’s God, and I assume he is from the liars.”

39.Samy Mahdy: And he and his troops arrogated on the earth, without the right. And they assumed they would not be returning to Us.

40.Samy Mahdy: So We took him, and his troops, so We forsake them in the Yam (deep water). So, observe how the oppressors' consequence was?

41.Samy Mahdy: And We set up them, Imams (leaders) calling to the Fire. And on the Resurrection Day, they will not be supported to victory.

42.Samy Mahdy: And We followed them in this Dunya (world) with a curse. And on Resurrection Day, they will be among the Nasty ones.

43.Samy Mahdy: We already gave Moses the Book after We had destroyed the former generations; Insights to the people and guidance and Mercy, perhaps they may be remembering.

44.Samy Mahdy: And you were not by the side of the Western when We decreed the command to Moses, nor were you from the witnesses.

45.Samy Mahdy: But We instituted generations so the age prolonged upon them. And you were not dwelling, in the inhabitants of Midian, reciting Our verses upon them. But We were sending messengers.

46.Samy Mahdy: And you were not beside Al-Tur (The Mount) when We called. But a mercy from your Lord, to warn a kinfolk who did not come to them a warner before you, perhaps they may be remembering.

47.Samy Mahdy: And if not that a calamity inflicted them with what their hands had put forward, so they would say, “Our Lord, why did You not send to us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses and been among the believers?”

48.Samy Mahdy: So, when the right came to them from Us, they said, “If only he was given what was like, which was given to Moses.” Did they not disbelieve in what was given to Moses from before? They said, “Two magicians backing up each other.” And they said, “Surely we are infidels with both.”

49.Samy Mahdy: Say, “So bring a book from Allah, more guiding than both of them, I will follow it, if you are truthful ones.”

50.Samy Mahdy: So, if they do not respond to you. So, know that they follow their desires. And who is more astray than him who follows his desire without guidance from Allah? Surely Allah does not guide the oppressor kinfolk.

51.Samy Mahdy: And We already have delivered the Saying, for them, perhaps they may be remembering.

52.Samy Mahdy: Those whom We gave the Book before it, they are in it believing.

53.Samy Mahdy: And when it is recited upon them, they said, “We have believed in it; surely it is the right from our Lord; surely we were Muslims before it.”

54.Samy Mahdy: Those will be given their wages twice, with what they are patient with; and they by the good deed, ward off the bad deed; and from what We had livelihood them, they are spending.

55.Samy Mahdy: And if they heard the chitchat, they turned away from it, and said, “We have our works, and you have your works; peace be upon you; we do not seek the ignorant ones.”

56.Samy Mahdy: You are not guiding whomever you love, but Allah guides whom He wills, and He is knower with the guided ones.

57.Samy Mahdy: And they said, “If we follow the guidance with you, we will be kidnaped from our land.” Did We not enable for them a Secure Sanctuary collected to it the fruitage of everything as a livelihood from Us? But most of them do not know.

58.Samy Mahdy: And how many among a village We destroyed, which ungrateful its living? So, these are their dwellings, not reside after them, except for a few. And We were the Inheritors.

59.Samy Mahdy: And Your Lord was not destroying the villages until He missioned a messenger in their mother village, reciting upon them Our verses. And We were not destroying the villages, except while their inhabitants were oppressors.

60.Samy Mahdy: And Whatever a thing you are given is only the Dunya (world)life enjoyment, and its adornment. And what is with Allah is goodness, and longer lasting. So, will yourselves not be reasoning?

61.Samy Mahdy: So, is he whom We have promised him a fine promise so he will meet it, as he whom We have enjoyed the Dunya life’ enjoyment (world), then he will be, on The Resurrection Day, from those who are brought in.?

62.Samy Mahdy: And on a Day when He will call them, so He says, “Where are My associates whom you were claiming?”

63.Samy Mahdy: Those upon them, the saying was truthed, said, “Our Lord, these are whom we lured them, we lured them as we were being lured. We demonstrate our innocence to You; they were not worshiping us.”

64.Samy Mahdy: And it is said, “Call your partners.” So, they call them, so they will not respond to them. And they saw the torment. If only they had been guided.

65.Samy Mahdy: And on a Day when He calls them, So He says, “What did you answer the Messengers?”

66.Samy Mahdy: So, the news was blinded upon them, on that Day, so they are not questioning each other.

67.Samy Mahdy: So, for who was repented, and believed, and worked righteous, so perhaps that he be among the gainers.

68.Samy Mahdy: And Your Lord creates whatever He wills, and He chooses what was for them the goodness. Glorified is Allah and exalted about what they are associating.

69.Samy Mahdy: And your Lord knows what their chests conceal, and what they are announcing.

70.Samy Mahdy: And He is Allah. There is no god except Him. For Him all the praise in the First, and in the Last. And for Him the judgment, and to Him you are returning.

71.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Have you seen? If Allah set up the night perpetual over you till The Resurrection Day, who is a god other than Allah will bring you illumination? So, will you not be hearing?”

72.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Have you seen? If Allah set up the day perpetual over you till The Resurrection Day, who is a god other than Allah will bring you with a night to rest in it? So, will you not be seeing?”

73.Samy Mahdy: And among His mercy He set up for you the night and the day, to rest in it, and to seek from His bounty; and perhaps you may be thankful.

74.Samy Mahdy: And on a Day when He will call them, and say, “Where are My associates whom you were claiming?”

75.Samy Mahdy: And We took off from every community, a witness, So We said, “Bring your evidence.” So, they knew that the right is for Allah, and strayed about them, what they were slandering.

76.Samy Mahdy: Surely Quaroon was among Moses’s kinfolk, so he transgressed over them. And We had given him among the treasures, whose keys would burden, with a band of the power possessors. When his kinfolk said to him, “Do not rejoice; Allah does not love the rejoicing ones.

77.Samy Mahdy: And seek, within what Allah has given you, The Hereafter Home, and do not forget your share among The Dunya (this world). And excel as Allah has excelled to you. And do not seek the spoiling in the earth. Surely Allah does not love the spoilers.”

78.Samy Mahdy: He said, “Surely I was given it upon knowledge, with me .” Did he not know that Allah destroyed before him among the generations, who was stronger than him in power, and greater in accumulation? And the criminals will not be asked about their misdeeds.

79.Samy Mahdy: So, he exited upon his kinfolk in his adornment. Those who wanted the Dunya (worldly) life said, “Oh, would that we had given as alike what Quaroon was given. He is a possessor of great luck.”

80.Samy Mahdy: And those who were given the knowledge said, “Woe to you! Allah’s reward is goodness for whoever believed and worked righteous.” And none receives it except the patient ones.

81.Samy Mahdy: So We collapsed the land down by him and his home. So, he had no group to give him victory without Allah, and he was not among the victors.

82.Samy Mahdy: And became those who had wished his place by Yesterday, were saying, “Oh it, as if Allah extends the livelihood for whomever He wills among His slaves, and He quantized it. If not, Allah had conferred favors upon us, He would have collapsed the land down by us. Alas it, as if the disbelievers will not be gained.”

83.Samy Mahdy: That is The Hereafter Home, We set it for those who do not want superiority on the earth, nor spoiling. And the consequence is for the pious.

84.Samy Mahdy: Whoever brings with the good deed, so for him is better than it. And whoever brings with, the bad deed, so those who worked the bad deeds will not be penalized except for what they were working.

85.Samy Mahdy: Surely the one Who imposed upon you the Quran, will return you to a promised appointed place. Say, “My Lord is knower of who brought with the guidance, and who is in an obvious astray.”

86.Samy Mahdy: And you were not expecting that the Book would be thrown to you, except as mercy from your Lord. So, do not be a backup for the infidels.

87.Samy Mahdy: And do not be hindered about Allah's verses after they have been sent down to you. And call to your Lord, and do not be among the polytheists.

88.Samy Mahdy: And do not call with Allah another god. No god except Him. Everything is destroyed except His Face. For Him is the judgment, and to Him you are returning.

1.Samy Mahdy: Alif, Lam, Meem.

2.Samy Mahdy: Have the people considered that they will be quitting to say, “We believed,” while they are not infatuating?

3.Samy Mahdy: And We have already infatuated those before them. So, Allah will know those who are truthful, and He will know the liars.

4.Samy Mahdy: Or do those who are working the bad deeds consider that they can outstrip Us? Bad was what they were judging.

5.Samy Mahdy: Whoever is expecting Allah’s meeting, So, Allah’s term is coming. And He is Al- Samaieu (The Hearer), Al-Aalim (The Knower).

6.Samy Mahdy: And whoever efforted, so he made an effort only for himself. Surely Allah is self-enriching about the worlds.

7.Samy Mahdy: And those who believed and worked the righteous deeds, We will atone about them, their bad deeds, and We will recompense them the best of what they were working.

8.Samy Mahdy: We have enjoined the human with his parents, a fineness. And if they, effort against you, to associate with Me by what you have no knowledge of, so do not obey them. To Me is your return all; so, I will inform you with what you were working on.

9.Samy Mahdy: And those who believed and worked the righteous deeds, We will enter them within the righteous.

10.Samy Mahdy: And among the people is he who says, “We have believed in Allah.” So, when he is hurt in the cause of Allah, he sets up the people's infatuation as like Allah’s torment. And if victory comes from your Lord, he will say, “We were with you.” Is not Allah a knower with what is within the worlds’ chests?

11.Samy Mahdy: And Allah will know those who believed, and He will know the hypocrites.

12.Samy Mahdy: And those who disbelieved said for those who believed, “Follow our pathway, and we will carry your guilt.” And they will not carry from their guilt, anything. Surely, they are liars.

13.Samy Mahdy: And they will carry their heaviness, and other heaviness with their heaviness. And they will be questioned on The Resurrection Day about what they were slandering.

14.Samy Mahdy: And We already sent Noah to his kinfolk, so He tarried among them for a thousand lunar years minus fifty years. So, the flood took them, while they were oppressors.

15.Samy Mahdy: So, We saved him, with the Ship’s companions, and We set it up as a verse for the worlds.

16.Samy Mahdy: And Abraham, when he said to his kinfolk, “Worship Allah, and show piety of Him. That is goodness for you, if you were knowing.

17.Samy Mahdy: You only worship without Allah idols, and you create a fake. Surely those you worship, without Allah, do not own a livelihood for you. So, seek the livelihood At, Allah, and worship Him, and thank Him. To Him you are returning.”

18.Samy Mahdy: And If you falsified, so already communities before you have falsified. And nought is upon the Messenger except the obvious notification.

19.Samy Mahdy: Have they not seen how Allah starts the creation, then He repeats it? Surely that is easy upon Allah.

20.Samy Mahdy: Say, “Walk on the earth, so observe how the creation was started.” Then Allah institutes the hereafter’ instituting. Surely Allah, over everything, is competent.”

21.Samy Mahdy: He tortures whomever He wills, and He mercifies whomever He wills, and to Him you will be overturned.

22.Samy Mahdy: And You are not causing incapacitation on earth or in the sky; and you have not without Allah among a guardian or victory supporter.
